google.title: Duolingo: Language Lessons
google.description:
Learn a new language with the world‚Äôs most-downloaded education app! Duolingo is the fun, free app for learning 40+ languages through quick, bite-sized lessons. Practice speaking, reading, listening, and writing to build your vocabulary and grammar skills.

Designed by learning experts and loved by hundreds of millions of learners worldwide, Duolingo helps you prepare for real conversations in Spanish, French, Chinese, Italian, German, English, and more.

And now, you can learn Math, Music, and Chess the Duolingo way!

‚Ä¢ Build real-world math skills ‚Äì from calculating tips to identifying patterns ‚Äì and sharpen your mental math in our Math course. Learn foundational topics like multiplication, fractions, geometry and more, and keep your brain sharp with more challenging exercises, games, and word problems.

‚Ä¢ Learn how to read music and play popular songs on your device in our Music course ‚Äì no piano or instrument required! Using an on-screen keyboard, you‚Äôll learn bit-by-bit, from finding notes on the keyboard to playing your first song.

‚Ä¢ Master moves, level up your game, and play real matches in our brand new Chess course. Checkmate!

Whether you‚Äôre learning for travel, school, career, family and friends, or your brain health, you‚Äôll love learning with Duolingo.

Why Duolingo?

‚Ä¢ Duolingo is fun and effective. Game-like lessons and fun characters help you build solid speaking, reading, listening, and writing skills.

‚Ä¢ Duolingo works. Designed by learning experts, Duolingo has a science-based teaching methodology proven to foster long-term knowledge retention.

‚Ä¢ Track your progress. Work toward your learning goals with playful rewards and achievements when you make practicing a daily habit!

‚Ä¢ Join millions of learners. Stay motivated with competitive Leaderboards as you learn alongside our global community.

‚Ä¢ Every language course is free. Learn Spanish, French, German, Italian, Russian, Portuguese, Turkish, Dutch, Irish, Danish, Swedish, Ukrainian, Esperanto, Polish, Greek, Hungarian, Norwegian, Hebrew, Welsh, Arabic, Latin, Hawaiian, Scottish Gaelic, Vietnamese, Korean, Japanese, English, and even High Valyrian! And now, learn Math, Music, and Chess with our newest courses!

What the world is saying about Duolingo‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è:

Editor's Choice and "Best of the Best‚Äù ‚Äî Google Play

‚ÄúFar and away the best language-learning app.‚Äù ‚Äî The Wall Street Journal

‚ÄúThis free app and website is among the most effective language-learning methods I‚Äôve tried‚Ä¶ lessons come in the form of brief challenges ‚Äî speaking, translating, answering multiple-choice questions ‚Äî that keep me coming back for more.‚Äù ‚Äî The New York Times

‚ÄúDuolingo may hold the secret to the future of education.‚Äù ‚Äî TIME Magazine

‚Äú...Duolingo is cheerful, lighthearted and fun‚Ä¶‚Äù ‚Äî Forbes

If you like Duolingo, try Super Duolingo for 14 days free! Learn a language fast with no ads, and get fun perks like Unlimited Hearts and Monthly Streak Repair.

Send any feedback to android@duolingo.com

Use Duolingo on the Web at https://www.duolingo.com

Privacy Policy: https://www.duolingo.com/privacy

reviews.review: Op advies van een vriendin gedownload. de eerste dag kon ik gewoon doorgaan met de lessen in de gratis versie, totdat ik niet meer verder kon, omdat mijn "tijd"op was. Ik moest dan een (proef)abonnement nemen van 7 dagen, wat ik daarna weer kosteloos kon annuleren. Ik zit nu op dag 2 van het proefabonnement en ik kan de app openen, maar hij blijft laden. Ik wacht tot dat de optie komt, dat mijn proefabonnement is afgelopen, zodat ik deze app weer kan verwijderen....
Op een leuke speelse wijzen zijn de lessen, goed te maken en werkt motiverend en stimulerend
fake friends in feed suddenly

Ik begon enthousiast met Duolingo in 2018. Jaren lang ook super gehad maar het wordt alleen maar duurder en minder interessant voor mij waardoor ik het gewoon niet meer hoef en nu met het nieuwe energie systeem in de gratis versie is het al helemaal niks meer aan. Je voelt je haast gedwongen om super te gaan nemen en ik ga dat niet doen op deze manier. Plus is het ook niet waard, je moet nog meer betalen voor MAX als je bijvoorbeeld fouten uitgelegd wil hebben.
super mooi les programma
Sinds de update kan je nog maar 2 lessen doen per keer. Daarna moet je betalen of reclame's kijken. Heel jammer en gaat ze een hoop mensen kosten.
geweldige stimulans om een taal te leren

door energie minder lang op duolingo review komt altijd als je 3x heb. vriendenmissie je seleteert iemand en vervolgend krijg je niemand. nu vriendenmissie beloning kort beschikbaar. legendarisch maken nu lastiger. dacht andere taal te doen als klaar met duits, maar door energie weet ik dat nog niet. als alleen savonds tijd lukt dat niet meer. omdat energie dan niet oplaad.
ik vind het super handig ik wil Spaans leren en nu kan ik dat al goed üòúüòú

het is heel leuk en leerzaam ik ben nu heel goet in Duits üá©üá™ duolingo is heel goed! zeker een dikke vette aanrader! 5 üåü

why can i see random people in my feed? i dont want to see them, only my friends. And i dont want others to see my stuff. please change if back otherwise i will cancel my subscription.

I used to love Duolingo - I have a 1300 day streak - but this recent 'energy' update just sucks man. Losing 7-8 energy per lesson while only gaining 5 by watching an ad is awful. It feels like I'm getting discouraged from learning a language. On a language learning app. Sure. Point is, this sucks. Unless Duolingo either reverts the recent changes or improves the energy system (full energy when watching a video, less energy used per lesson?), I will begrudgingly keep going, but only for my streak

Ik had het niet perse verwacht, maar door dit elke dag te doen de afgelopen 65 dagen, leer ik hetgeen me eerder niet lukte te leren, (vooral omdat ik de aandacht er niet bij kon houden) en dat is het toepassen van de juiste werkwoordsvormen in het Spaans. En tegelijk leer ik langzaam de basis van het opbouwen van zinnen. ik merk dat het steeds een stukje meer vanuit mezelf komt. Door heel veel herhaling en goede opbouw van kleine beetjes bijleren. Since Duolingo changed Hearts to Energy, the app became wortless as free language learning app. You can do max 2 to 3 lessons a day. That's not how you can learn a language. They force you to pay to unlock unlimited lessons. I really regret their decision. Once you pay, it's a great app. All kind of challenges and leagues motivate you to do lessons. However, after years of streaks in the highest league, I (have to) quit Duolingo, as it simply isn't working anymore. Bye.
Klopt het dat er nu hele kleine hoofdstukken zijn met heel veel precies dezelfde vragen en dat de triple xp boost die beloofd wordt bij het behalen van de 3 doelen niet meer werkt?

Het zou 5 sterren zijn geweest als het niet was voor de opdringerige advertenties na elke les om Super Duolingo te nemen. Het feit dat het harten systeem is vervangen door een of andere energie meter is belachelijk. Geforceerd worden om extra bij te kopen anders kun je niet nog een les afmaken is ronduit schandalig. Als je harten op waren was het jouw eigen schuld, omdat je te veel fouten maakt. Maar gestraft worden omdat je te lang doorgaat is zo idioot.

google.title: Airlearn - Language Learning
google.description:
Airlearn: Learn Spanish, German, French, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Hindi, English, Turkish, and Russian in one intuitive app. Enjoy short lessons, cultural insights, and fun practice slides that make language learning stress-free and engaging.

OUR APPROACH
‚Ä¢ Learn First, Practice Next: We teach key grammar, vocabulary, and cultural context before you dive into quizzes. Gain real understanding instead of guessing.  
‚Ä¢ Rich Cultural Insights: Explore history, customs, and local expressions. Language is more than words‚ÄîAirlearn helps you appreciate its cultural essence.  
‚Ä¢ Clean & Minimalist: No overblown gamification or cluttered screens. Lessons stay focused, so you can learn at your own pace without distractions.  
‚Ä¢ Weekly Leagues & XP: Motivate yourself by competing with others studying the same language. Earn XP from each lesson and climb the leaderboard for extra fun.

WHY AIRLEARN
‚Ä¢ Concise Lessons: Each module covers grammar rules, vocabulary, and examples in bite-sized slides.  
‚Ä¢ Practical Dialogues: From casual greetings to deeper conversations, practice relevant situations.  
‚Ä¢ Spaced Repetition: Lock new words into long-term memory with our smart revision approach.  
‚Ä¢ Track Progress: Daily goals, streaks, and achievements keep your momentum alive.  
‚Ä¢ Community Feel: Join like-minded learners, share study tips, and celebrate mutual achievements.

DIVE INTO 12 LANGUAGES
1. Spanish: Vibrant dialogues for travel, work, or fun.  
2. German: Master precise grammar for Europe‚Äôs economic hub.  
3. French: Absorb its romantic flair and cultural legacy.  
4. Italian: Savor the melodic flow and culinary charm.  
5. Dutch: Expand career options in a globalized world.  
6. Portuguese: Explore Brazil‚Äôs rich diversity or Portugal‚Äôs historic roots.  
7. Japanese: Conquer kanji, hiragana, and katakana with confidence.  
8. Korean: Learn Hangeul, K-pop phrases, and daily expressions.  
9. Chinese: Build listening and reading skills in one of the world‚Äôs most spoken tongues.  
10. Hindi: Unlock India‚Äôs cultural treasure, cinema, and business potential.  
11. English: Hone global communication for travel, work, or personal growth.  
12. Russian: Tackle Cyrillic and immerse in a language of literary tradition.

HOW IT WORKS  
1. Install Airlearn: Begin with the basics or jump into advanced modules anytime.  
2. Learn: Study essential grammar and vocabulary in short, clear lessons.  
3. Practice: Tackle engaging quizzes and drills to reinforce your knowledge.  
4. Compete: Earn XP and measure your progress in our fun Weekly League.  
5. Flourish: Speak, read, and write with newfound fluency and cultural understanding.

WHAT SETS US APART
‚Ä¢ Genuine Learning: We prioritize understanding over memorization.  
‚Ä¢ All Levels Welcome: From novices to pros, our modules adapt to you.  
‚Ä¢ Regular Updates: New lessons and features keep it fresh.  
‚Ä¢ Lifestyle Friendly: Learn anytime‚Äîduring breaks, commutes, or weekends.

GET STARTED FOR FREE
Airlearn transforms language study into an immersive experience. Whether you‚Äôre planning a trip, boosting your r√©sum√©, or simply curious about global cultures, we‚Äôll guide you step by step. Enjoy short lessons that fit smoothly into your day, gather XP, and watch your language skills skyrocket.

Join thousands of motivated learners worldwide. Download Airlearn now for Spanish, German, French, Italian, Dutch, Portuguese, Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Hindi, English, or Russian. Experience the spark of real progress, gain cultural know-how, and feel the thrill of community-powered learning. Go beyond translations‚Äîmaster languages in a way that truly sticks. With Airlearn, you‚Äôll open doors to new friendships, opportunities, and an expanded worldview. Welcome to your next adventure in language mastery!

google.title: Speak: Language Learning
google.description:
Get ready to take your language skills to the next level with Speak, the ultimate language learning app focusing on improving your speaking abilities. Powered by cutting-edge AI technology, Speak ensures that you gain fluency by engaging in real-life conversations and receiving instant feedback. Whether you are learning Spanish, English, French, Italian, Japanese or Korean, Speak's AI-powered lessons will have you learning a new language fast.

With Speak, you'll feel like you have a personal language tutor right in your pocket. Our app provides immersive speaking practice sessions that simulate real-life scenarios, allowing you to become confident in your conversational Spanish, English, French, Italian, Japanese and Korean skills. The advanced AI function analyzes your speech, providing valuable assessment on pronunciation, intonation, and fluency. Say goodbye to those language barriers as you receive real-time feedback, enabling you to make necessary adjustments and improve your speaking skills on the spot.

Our comprehensive language learning curriculum is available for Spanish, English, French, Italian, Japanese and Korean learners, ensuring that you become fluent. Whether you're a beginner or an advanced learner, Speak caters to your individual needs and helps you progress at your own pace. You'll love the personalized progress tracking, which helps you identify areas that need improvement, allowing you to focus your efforts effectively.

Speak's method is simple:
STEP 1: Do a real language learning lesson!
Learn real-life, essential phrases with your dedicated local teacher.

STEP 2: Practice speaking the language!
Repeat the learned phrases until you can speak without thinking twice!

STEP 3: AI Tutor provides personalized language feedback!
With the latest AI technology, you can practice anywhere and anytime! Get real-time feedback on pronunciations, grammar, and much more.

STEP 4: Real conversations in your chosen language!
Now put what you've learned into real-life situations and speak with confidence!

No more boring textbooks or one-sided conversations! With Speak, you'll experience interactive and engaging language practice that feels like a real-life conversation. Break free from traditional language learning and download Speak now! Gain fluency, receive real-time feedback, and become a confident speaker in Spanish, English, French, Italian, Japanese or Korean.

There are plenty of other language apps out there, but Speak's key difference comes down to getting you speaking Spanish, English, French, Italian, Japanese or Korean out loud on day 1.

SPEAK MEMBERSHIP

Speak offers both monthly and annual auto-renewing subscriptions. Become a Speak Member to gain unlimited access to all courses, singles, review material, and other content within Speak.

The subscription will automatically renew unless turned off in your Google Play Account settings at least 24 hours before the current period ends. You can go to your Google Play Account settings to manage your subscription and turn off auto-renew. Your Google Play Account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed. If you subscribe before your free trial ends, the rest of your free trial period will be forfeited as soon as your purchase is confirmed.

Terms of Service: https://speak.com/tos
Privacy Policy: https://speak.com/privacy

google.title: Babbel - Learn Languages
google.description: Millions of people learn languages with Babbel ‚Äî the app built by language learning experts. Our short, interactive lessons rethink old-school language education to get you speaking a new language with confidence. LEARN SPANISH OR 13 OTHER LANGUAGES IN 15 MIN/DAY We're not just a Spanish learning app! Want to learn French, learn Italian or speak German like a local? You can learn: Spanish üá™üá∏üá≤üáΩ | French üá´üá∑ | Italian üáÆüáπ | German üá©üá™ | Portuguese üáßüá∑ | Russian üá∑üá∫ | Polish üáµüá± | Turkish üáπüá∑ | Norwegian üá≥üá¥ | Danish üá©üá∞ | Swedish üá∏üá™ | Dutch üá≥üá± | Indonesian üáÆüá© | English üá¨üáßüá∫üá∏ Babbel is great for beginners but even experienced language learners have proven to advance their conversation skills!* ====== BABBEL WORKS! ‚òÖ Effectiveness backed by researchers at Yale University: 100% of study participants improved their oral proficiency in 3 months* *Based on a study conducted with Babbel users learning Spanish. Available at http://bit.ly/BabbelYale. ‚òÖ After 10 hours with Babbel, Michigan State University researchers found: 96% of learners saw better test scores on grammar and vocabulary** **Based on a study conducted with Babbel users learning Spanish. Available: http://bit.ly/BabbelMSU. ‚òÖ PCMagazine says the Babbel language app ‚Äúexceeds expectations‚Äù ====== Babbel is the best language-learning app. Our language learning experts build every course tailored to your native language. So whether you want to learn Spanish, learn Italian or learn French ‚Äî or even German, Portuguese, Russian, Polish, Turkish, Norwegian, Danish, Swedish, Dutch, Indonesian or English ‚Äî you‚Äôll learn quickly and effectively. BITE-SIZE, INTERACTIVE LESSONS - Easily fit language learning into your busy schedule with lessons that take only 10-15 minutes to complete (some Spanish lessons are even shorter). LANGUAGES FOR ANY SITUATION - Find language lessons for travel, work, everyday life and much, much more LISTEN, SPEAK, READ, WRITE - Practice all the elements of language learning and start speaking real-life conversations IMPROVE YOUR PRONUNCIATION - Babbel‚Äôs speech recognition technology helps you sound like a native speaker REMEMBER WHAT YOU LEARN - Use the review feature so the previous lessons stick, and understand grammar (including Spanish conjugation) LEARN LANGUAGES IN CONTEXT - Enhance your language learning with tips & tricks that guide you throughout lessons OVER 6,000 LANGUAGE COURSES - Learn Spanish and 13 other languages with in-depth content, including more than 60,000 language lessons With Babbel, you‚Äôll be on your way to mastering the ultimate goal of language learning ‚Äî having real-life conversations with confidence. Whether you need a Spanish learning app or a French learning app, you‚Äôve always wanted to learn Italian, you‚Äôre looking to dive into German language learning or improve your English, Babbel is the choice of millions of people looking to enhance their language education. Make learning a habit. Go beyond language 101 and you'll learn a language you can use to talk in real-life situations. ===== Subscriptions: You‚Äôll need a subscription to use Babbel fully. Your subscription will be renewed unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current payment period. DOWNLOAD BABBEL AND TRY FOR FREE ‚Äì Your first lesson is on us. Babbel is completely ad-free. Privacy policy: https://about.babbel.com/en/privacy/ Terms of use: https://about.babbel.com/en/terms/ Not a native speaker but want to talk just like one? Download Babbel and improve your German language learning, learn English or discover how to speak Spanish. Take your language education to new levels ‚Äî whether you want to learn French, Italian, Mexican Spanish, German or any of the 14 languages we offer! Contact us: Questions, comments or feedback about language learning with Babbel? Email us at support-mobile@babbel.com.

reviews.review: I prefer this app over others when it comes to context and challenge. However, there is one reason why I wanted to write a 'negative' review and that is regarding the voice recognition. This is horrible, even when I exaggerate the word(s) it does not register the word correctly making me want to skip those lessons by default. I hope it will get better, but I am not getting my hopes up.

google.title: HelloTalk - Learn Languages
google.description: Practice languages with native speakers on HelloTalk! We recently introduced HelloTalk Live and Voiceroom - interactive language and culture events to help you master languages through the content you love! HelloTalk, the original language exchange app, connects you with native speakers to practice languages (English, Japanese, Korean, Spanish, French, Mandarin Chinese, Portuguese, German, Italian, Russian, Arabic, Turkish, Hindi, Indonesian, Thai, Vietnamese and 160+ more) for FREE! HelloTalk equips you with learning tools such as translation and instant captions so you can learn by chatting with native speakers. Learn languages from locals around the world through livestreams and Voicerooms. Connect with expert hosts to discuss interesting topics with language partners in the learning community! Why HelloTalk? ‚ñ∫ Real language learning atmosphere Whether you're focused on a widely spoken language or a less common one, HelloTalk caters to your needs. The system smartly matches you based on your native language and proficiency, while allowing you to filter ideal language partners according to various criteria such as age, location, and gender. Plus, with built-in translation and transliteration tools, you can communicate confidently without any language barriers. ‚ñ∫ A powerful tool for sharpening your language skills Acquiring new words through conversations with native speakers is more effective than rigid memorization. Whether you're a student preparing for exams like the CET, GRE, TOEFL, IELTS, planning to study abroad, or a professional seeking career advancement through language skills, HelloTalk offers native speakers who match your proficiency level for engaging interactions and valuable learning experiences. ‚ñ∫ Immersive multi-person language chat rooms If you choose to learn Spanish, for example, every Voiceroom you enter on HelloTalk gathers Spanish learners and Spanish native speakers from around the world to discuss interesting topics. Here, only your voice needs to be heard, creating a comfortable, introvert-friendly atmosphere. Here, sharing mutual interests allows everyone to freely express themselves and share personal experiences, fostering both language intuition and authentic expression skills. It's incredibly addictive! ‚ñ∫ Diverse global Livestreams HelloTalk features handpicked foreign language hosts who offer online video lessons, share language insights, and provide glimpses into their lives abroad. You can even join them on stage for one-on-one video conversations with fellow language learners. Whether you're grappling with pronunciation, speaking speed, or shyness, these hosts will assist you in refining your language skills and guiding the conversation. For rapid improvement in spoken language, there's no substitute for direct communication with native speakers! ‚ñ∫ International Moments HelloTalk's Moments offers real-time posts covering learning, lifestyle, and cultural insights from around the world. It's your ticket to discovering fresh perspectives and gaining deeper insights into diverse cultural customs, all from the comfort of your home. Don't forget to engage with posts that catch your interest! google.title: Drops: Language Learning Games
google.description:
Drops is a fun, visual language learning app where bite-size lessons feel like play. Build vocabulary fast with language learning games, word games, and vocabulary games that make every minute count. Perfect for beginners and busy learners who want to learn a new language or improve vocabulary ‚Äî whether you‚Äôre looking to learn Spanish, learn English, or explore different languages.

Why choose Drops?
‚Ä¢ Game-based learning: quick sessions use matching, swipes, and quiz games to make language learning feel effortless.
‚Ä¢ Smart review system: practice words at the right time to remember them longer ‚Äî a true vocabulary builder that helps you expand vocabulary every day.
‚Ä¢ Clear audio by native speakers: ideal if you want to learn pronunciation or speak confidently in English, Spanish, Japanese, or Korean.
‚Ä¢ Personalised goals and streaks: stay motivated and keep your study habit strong.
‚Ä¢ Beautiful visuals: icons and animations help you memorise faster, even for complex languages like Japanese, Korean, or Arabic.

What you‚Äôll learn
‚Ä¢ Core vocabulary and phrases for travel, work, and daily life.
‚Ä¢ Essential topics: food, numbers, directions, time, shopping, and more ‚Äî perfect for learning Spanish for beginners or anyone wondering how to learn Spanish or how to study Korean.
‚Ä¢ Practice reading and listening with fun word games and learning games that make studying feel like a challenge, not a chore.

Popular language packs
Learn English, Learn Spanish (including Mexican Spanish), Learn Japanese (Hiragana & Katakana), Learn French, Learn Korean (Hangul), Learn German, Learn Italian, Learn Chinese (Mandarin), Learn Arabic, and Learn Portuguese (Brazilian Portuguese).
You can also learn Dutch, learn Turkish, learn Vietnamese, learn Polish, learn Greek, learn Hebrew, and many more ‚Äî making Drops the perfect app for mastering new languages.

Perfect for quick daily study
Set a daily goal and study for 5‚Äì10 minutes. Daily play with language learning games helps you build vocabulary, improve pronunciation, and expand your English vocabulary or Spanish vocabulary naturally. The more you play, the more you learn.

Key features at a glance
‚Ä¢ Language learning games that turn study into play.
‚Ä¢ Word games and quiz games to learn new words fast.
‚Ä¢ Audio pronunciation practice to perfect your accent in English, Spanish, French, and more.
‚Ä¢ Offline practice available for subscribed users.
‚Ä¢ Built-in vocabulary builder that helps you remember words through repetition and visual association.

Who is Drops for?
‚Ä¢ Beginners starting a new language ‚Äî from learn Spanish for free to learn Arabic for beginners.
‚Ä¢ Learners returning to refresh vocabulary ‚Äî try English grammar practice or irregular verbs through play.
‚Ä¢ Travellers who want key phrases before a trip ‚Äî perfect for learning Japanese, learning Korean, or learning Spanish vocabulary.
‚Ä¢ Students and professionals using a study app or language learning app for beginners to boost their skills in English for working adults or English for technology.

Why it works
‚Ä¢ Focus on vocabulary: you learn the most useful words for real-life conversations.
‚Ä¢ Micro-learning: short, frequent sessions that fit your schedule and boost memory.
‚Ä¢ Visual learning: icons and illustrations make it easy to connect meaning to words ‚Äî ideal for Japanese vocabulary, French vocabulary, and English learning.

Get started today

Download Drops now and start learning languages through games. Build confidence as you learn Spanish, learn English, learn Japanese, learn Korean, learn French, learn German, learn Italian, learn Chinese, learn Arabic, and practice Portuguese ‚Äî then explore even more at your own pace.
Drops makes language learning simple, effective, and genuinely fun.

Privacy Policy & Terms: http://languagedrops.com/privacypolicy.html

google.title: Mango Languages Learning
google.description:
Ready to have real conversations? Mango Languages prioritizes real language, real culture, and real progress. Our comprehensive learning platform offers conversational language lessons in 70+ languages, teaching vocabulary, pronunciation, grammar, and culture simultaneously.

From preparing for vacation or working abroad, to personal development and academic growth, our language courses are designed to take you wherever you wish to go.

HOW DOES MANGO WORK?

Learn languages from native speakers with courses that feature thousands of real recordings.
Enhance comprehension with interactive listening and reading activities and bolster your learning with personalized daily reviews.
Refine speaking skills with phonetic spellings, natural and slow pronunciations, and our pronunciation comparison tool.
Sync progress across all platforms and NO ADS, so you can learn anywhere, at any time, with no distractions.

WHY CHOOSE MANGO?

Practical, Authentic Content: The outcome of using Mango is the ability to speak and communicate in real conversations.

Linguist-Approved Language Courses: Each course is designed by expert linguists to provide high-quality instruction that produces real results.

Placement Tests: Not sure where to start? Use our placement tests in select languages to identify the best starting point.

Individualized Review: Our intelligent review system helps you retain knowledge through spaced repetition and adapts to your progress.

Practice with Flashcards: Supercharge your vocabulary with built-in flashcards or take it a step further and create your own lists!

On-The-Go Learning: Download lessons to your phone for offline access and take advantage of our hands-free audio feature!

HOW CAN I START?

When you sign up, you can find free access through a subscribing organization, like a public library, or you can subscribe with a 14-day free trial. Cancel at any time.

Serious about language learning? Our paid subscriptions include: 
Individual Plan: Access to all of our languages in one learning profile.

google.title: Rosetta Stone: Learn, Practice
google.description: Why the Rosetta Stone app? Because the best way to learn a new language is to surround yourself with it, and our language learning app does just that. Rosetta Stone‚Äôs Dynamic Immersion¬Æ method uses interactive and contextual language lessons blended with Extended Learning features. Everything you need is literally at your fingertips‚Äìany time, anywhere, any device; online or off and completely ad-free. RECENT AWARDS ‚Ä¢ 2019 PCMag Editors‚Äô Choice ‚Ä¢ 2019 Tabby Awards Winner ‚Ä¢ 2019 Best Mobile App Awards: Best Designed App and Best Overall App For the first time, we‚Äôre offering every one of our languages under one subscription. Flip between languages as often as you‚Äôd like and enjoy the freedom to get seriously curious. To access all languages, simply select Unlimited Languages when you subscribe. Practice and learn to speak Spanish, French, German, Italian, English, Japanese, Korean, Chinese, Arabic, Portuguese, Russian, Dutch, Filipino, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Irish, Persian, Polish, Swedish, Turkish, Vietnamese, and more! Rosetta Stone helps you speak confidently. With a variety of speaking-focused lessons and features, instantaneous pronunciation feedback with TruAccent, a track record of getting people speaking any language confidently and a near-five star rating in the app store, the award-winning Rosetta Stone mobile app is the best way to learn and speak new languages. What you want to learn, first. Let us know why you're learning a new language and we'll create a game plan with curated content and helpful lesson reminders to help you stay on track in your learning journey**. Fits any schedule. Take a 10-minute lesson anywhere, study online or off. Never leaves your side. Practice languages here, there, and everywhere. Learn to speak English, Spanish, Chinese, Japanese or any language you want. Don‚Äôt get lost in translation. Touch and hold anything from your Core Lessons to reveal its translation*. Speak confidently. TruAccent¬Æ technology provides real-time pronunciation feedback and helps you speak confidently. Go beyond memorization. Learn in context using our Dynamic Immersion¬Æ method. Extended Language Learning Features Say it like a local. Improve pronunciation and practice speaking by reading aloud while listening to native speakers with stories and useful conversations. Always know what to say. Get easy-to-understand greetings, phrases, expressions, daily conversations and more with Phrasebook*. Train your ear. Take a break from the screen by listening to Audio Companion¬Æ lessons. Select a language learning subscription: Choose from 3 and 12-month subscriptions‚Äîas well as a Lifetime option. No translators, grammar books or dictionary needed! Available Languages: Spanish (Latin American or Spain) French German Italian English (American or British) Japanese Korean Chinese (Mandarin) Arabic Portuguese (Brazil) Russian Dutch Filipino (Tagalog) Greek Hebrew Hindi Irish Persian (Farsi) Polish Swedish Turkish Vietnamese Enterprise and Education Learners Unlimited use of Rosetta Stone's mobile app is available for existing Enterprise and Education Learners. Features may vary for Enterprise and Education Learners. *Available with select languages on the Rosetta Stone: Learn Languages app. **Your Plan languages offered for Android are English, French, Italian, German, and Spanish.

google.title: Lingo Legend Language Learning
google.description:
Learn a language while playing language learning games! Master Spanish, French, Mandarin, Korean, Japanese, Italian, German, Portuguese, Dutch, or Russian with our innovative language learning games. Dive into a fantasy world where learning languages is an adventure. Now featuring two exciting game modes!

*Farm Mode*
- Practice your language skills in a cozy, relaxing environment within the enchanting world of Lingo Legend.
- Plant and harvest crops, unlocking infrastructure to expand your farm.
- Customize your dream farm with tons of unique decorations.
- Breed and care for adorable farm animals, the naala.
- Meet new villagers and build lasting friendships.

*Adventure Mode*
- Test your language learning skills in strategic monster battles.
- Draw ability cards from a personalized deck and answer language flashcards to use them.
- Collect cards, choose your strategy, and build your deck.
- Embark on perilous journeys, meet captivating characters, and complete quests.
- Explore a dynamic, mysterious world filled with beautiful landscapes.
- Find recipes, gather materials, and craft gear to gain experience and style.
- Play as a customizable avatar with unique gear to collect and equip.
- Personalize your camp with tons of unlockable content.

Developed by language learning experts, Lingo Legend offers over 200 categories of grammar, vocabulary, and common phrases. It's the perfect app to complement or kick-start your language learning journey. Lingo Legend isn't just another language learning app‚Äîit's a real game!

*Supported Languages*
- French (France & Canadian)
- Spanish
- Japanese
- Korean
- Mandarin Chinese
- German
- Italian
- Portuguese (Brazilian & European)
- Dutch
- Russian

*Educational Features*
- Developed by language learning experts passionate about keeping you engaged.
- Learn words and phrases relevant to everyday life with themes like Ordering Food and Meeting New People.
- Ensure long-term retention with our spaced-repetition algorithm.
- Define your learning path and practice what you want, when you want.

Download Lingo Legend now and revolutionize your language learning with fun and interactive language games!

Have questions? Want to connect with us?

google.title: LangLearn: Language learning
google.description:
LangLearn is your personalized AI language companion. It adapts to your level, goals, and busy life. Whether you're a beginner, a professional, or a traveler, LangLearn helps you speak English and Spanish fluently with speaking practice, grammar, and real-world immersion in quick, fun lessons.


‚óÜ For Every Level: Tailored Learning Paths ‚óÜ

-Beginners: Start with the Basics!

*Learn essential greetings, basic grammar (e.g., "I am/he is"), and survival phrases for travel with AI.

*Build confidence by practicing with AI in real-life situations like ordering food or asking for directions.

-Intermediate Learners: Think Deeper, Speak Smoother!

*Have debates, tell stories, or roleplay workplace meetings with AI.

*Improve grammar by correcting mistakes with tailored feedback (e.g., "If I were..." vs. "If I was...").

-Advanced Speakers: Perfect Your Edge!

*Master idioms, refine writing, or focus on accent reduction.

*Tackle expert scenarios like negotiating, giving TED talks, or analyzing news with AI.


‚óÜ For Every Scenario: Learn Exactly What You Need, Right When You Need It ‚óÜ

-Traveler Mode: Master travel Language‚Äîpractice airport conversations, hotel check-ins, directions, and cultural tips for a smooth trip.

-Career Mode: Improve professional Terms. Practice job interviews, write emails, and give presentations with confidence. Get feedback with prompts like ‚ÄúPitch your idea to an AI CEO.‚Äù

-Exam Mode: Ace language tests like TOEFL and IELTS. Take timed speaking simulations with AI scoring to know exactly where to improve.

-Daily Life Mode: Practice everyday phrase. Chat about hobbies, movies, tech trends, or anything you enjoy‚Äîmake learning fun and easy!



‚óÜ Learn in 10 Minutes a Day ‚óÜ

Short on time? No problem! LangLearn fits into your everyday life, helping you improve your spoken language no matter where you are.

-During Your Commute: Turn traffic or transit time into productive practice with hands-free AI lessons for real-life conversations.

-While Getting Ready: Use your morning or evening routine to listen to short lessons or practice phrases aloud, building fluency with the AI.

-Before Bed: Let AI summarize your day‚Äôs learning in minutes, highlighting your strengths, new vocabulary, and areas to improve, so you‚Äôre ready for the next day.



‚óÜ Your Personal AI Language Coach: Patient, Intelligent, and Always There for You ‚óÜ

-Real-Time Speech Feedback: Speak with confidence! Get instant, precise analysis on your pronunciation, intonation, and fluency‚Äîlike ‚ÄúYour ‚Äòth‚Äô sounds a bit like ‚Äòd‚Äô‚Äîlet‚Äôs practice together!‚Äù Receive practical tips that really make a difference.

-Personalized Challenges: Say goodbye to one-size-fits-all. Your AI coach continuously tracks your progress and adapts lesson difficulty‚Äîso you‚Äôre always challenged, but never overwhelmed or bored.

Encouragement & Emotional Support: Feeling stuck or stressed? Your AI coach notices and offers uplifting words and mindful tips. Learn at your own pace, with kind support every step of the way.


================================


Subscription terms:

Unlock unlimited access to everything in the app and take your spoken language to the next level

App Store offers auto-renewing subscriptions with unlimited access. Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of each subscription term unless you turn off the auto-renewal in your iPhone Settings, at least 24 hours before the current period ends.

Feel free to reach out to us at langlearn08@gmail.com ‚Äî we‚Äôd love to hear from you.

google.title: Jojo AI: Language Tutor
google.description:
Master Any Language with Jojo ‚Äî Your AI Speaking Tutor

Go beyond phrasebooks, random chatbots, and passive learning apps. Jojo is your AI-powered native speaking tutor, guiding you through complete, structured lessons from start to finish ‚Äî so you can speak any language naturally and confidently in real-life situations.

Whether you‚Äôre learning Spanish, Chinese, French, Japanese, Korean, English, or more, Jojo transforms real-world scenarios into interactive, voice-driven speaking lessons that feel just like practicing with a real native tutor ‚Äî available 24/7, right on your phone.

Built for Real Conversation Skills:
Jojo isn‚Äôt about memorizing isolated phrases. Every lesson follows a proven path: vocabulary, grammar, guided speaking, and roleplays. You‚Äôll learn the exact words, sentence patterns, and pronunciation you need ‚Äî then immediately apply them in realistic, back-and-forth conversations.

End-to-End Lessons, AI-Powered:
From introducing a topic to practicing it in context, Jojo‚Äôs AI walks you through each step:

1. Learn: Get clear, bite-sized explanations of grammar, vocabulary, and cultural context.
2. Practice: Say it out loud, get instant corrections, and repeat until it feels natural.
3. Apply: Jump into immersive roleplays where Jojo responds like a real native speaker.

Roleplays That Feel Real:
Order food in Tokyo, negotiate in Paris, chat with friends in Madrid, or navigate a taxi ride in Beijing ‚Äî Jojo adapts each roleplay to your target language, level, and learning goals. You‚Äôll get instant feedback, pronunciation help, and cultural tips to make your speech authentic and confident.

On-Demand Pronunciation, Grammar & Translation Support:
Tap any phrase to hear native pronunciation, see translations, and explore grammar notes. Learn alternative expressions so you can adapt to any conversation.

Your Personal AI Speaking Coach:
Need to slow down, ask ‚ÄúHow would a native say this?‚Äù, or get a cultural explanation? Jojo responds instantly ‚Äî giving you the personalized, on-demand guidance of a live tutor without scheduling or time limits.

Practice Smarter, Remember Longer:
Jojo tracks every word and phrase you practice, reinforcing them with smart spaced repetition so your progress sticks and your fluency grows.

Achieve Your Language Learning Goals:
With Jojo, you‚Äôll go beyond textbook knowledge to speak naturally in the real world. Perfect for learners aiming to:
- Speak confidently in professional, travel, or social settings
- Prepare for language proficiency exams
- Build conversational fluency quickly
- Connect with people and cultures around the world

google.title: LingoDeer - Learn Languages
google.description:
Want to learn a new language, such as Japanese, French, Spanish or Korean on your own? Give LingoDeer a try!

Available courses for English speakers:
Korean, Japanese, Mandarin Chinese, Arabic, French, German, Greek, Hindi, Indonesian, Italian, Malay, Polish, Brazilian Portuguese, Russian, Spanish (Latin American or European), Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese.

What can LingoDeer do for you?
‚Äª Learn to read and write a language with a unique alphabet system, such as Korean or Japanese 
‚Äª Learn to form sentences in your own words by following a structured course
‚Äª Learn the essential vocabulary and grammar from beginner to intermediate levels (A1-B1)
‚Äª Improve listening and improve pronunciation with HD recordings by native speakers 
‚Äª Reinforce learning with various review activities: flashcards, quizzes, target trainings and more
‚Äª Track your progress and statistics
‚Äª Download lessons to learn offline

What makes LingoDeer different? Its teaching power. 

Instead of relying on users to figure things out, LingoDeer offers a structured, clear and motivating path toward fluency. 

By providing the best structured curricula among apps and clear explanations on grammar, LingoDeer enables users to form sentences in their own words, not just memorize and repeat after a phrasebook.

As a result, users gain a clear sense of progression through following this path and are able to maintain long-term motivation. 

What‚Äôs more, the variety of activities supported in LingoDeer gives users the flexibility to personalize their study. From speaking exercises about food allergies, to drilling words with flashcards or 5-min pop quizzes during lunch breaks, let LingoDeer surprise you with every session.

If you don‚Äôt know where to start with learning a new language, start with LingoDeer. 

PLEASE NOTE:¬†
You will need a LingoDeer membership in order to access all courses and features.¬†

Support: 
Found a bug? Let us know and help us make LingoDeer better!
Email: hi@lingodeer.com 
https://m.me/lingodeer

google.title: Pingo AI Language Learning
google.description:
Join 1,500,000+ language learners who use Pingo AI to learn a language. Pingo AI is an AI language learning app that uses results-driven AI for you to learn a language and speak fluently through real-life conversations.

üëã Speak to Pingo AI as you would a friend
Talk about your day, ask questions, and explore the language together. Pingo, your speaking companion, gives you instant feedback to dramatically improve your language learning skills. Practice speaking from 25+ languages to refine your vocabulary, grammar, and fluency, as well as speak confidently in real conversations.

üéØ Why use Pingo AI to learn languages
‚úì Learn to speak fluently through real-life conversations.
‚úì Get personalized language lessons.
‚úì Learn exactly what to improve, including vocabulary, grammar, relevancy and fluency.
‚úì Learn words and phrases you‚Äôll actually use.
‚úì Become fluent in a language.
‚úì Proven effectiveness for beginners, advanced learners, and everyone in between.

üí¨ Choose language lessons from these languages:
Learn to speak fluent English, Spanish, French, German, Japanese, Korean, Italian, Chinese (Mandarin), Portuguese, Russian, Arabic, Dutch, Turkish, Polish, Vietnamese, Hindi, Thai, Hebrew, Greek, Indonesian, Swedish, Norwegian, Danish, Persian, and Ukrainian.

‚ú® How to use Pingo AI* to learn a language:
1) Create or choose from engaging, real-life conversation scenarios.

2) Talk with an ultra-realistic AI that feels like a native speaker, adapting to your pace and skill level.

3) Receive actionable feedback and tips for improvement on vocabulary, grammar, fluency, engagement, and relevance for every language conversation.

4) Use Language Learning Tutor Mode for guided practice and review useful words to reinforce learning.

5) Get fluent faster and build lasting language confidence.

üó£Ô∏è Consistently speaking and conversing in the foreign language is essential to confidently speak, learn, and become fluent in a language. Pingo AI Language Learning transforms self-guided practice into a goal-oriented, interactive learning experience that‚Äôs far more effective than simply repeating basic phrases aloud or struggling to find opportunities for real-life conversations. Pingo AI helps you on your language learning journey.

google.title: Learn Dutch - Speak Dutch
google.description: Learn Dutch with 5 minutes of practice daily. Mondly is the quick fix that will teach you core Dutch words and Dutch phrases for conversation, just like a phrasebook. If you want to learn beyond the basics, there are also Dutch grammar lessons available. With Mondly you can learn Dutch sentences and expressions FREE with daily Dutch language lessons online. This app is the effective way for beginners to study verbs, pronunciation and how to speak like a native with daily practice. The secret path to language learning Remember the Dutch language classes in school? You started with hundreds of basic words and expressions, continued with tons of Dutch grammar lessons and at the end of a full semester‚Äôs language course you could barely translate a sentence or say ‚ÄúHello!‚Äù to a local. Does it sound familiar? That‚Äôs the traditional way to learn a language. But it‚Äôs not the fastest and not the most efficient way. Mondly has a different approach, that‚Äôs opposite to the average language course. This is how the future of language courses looks like The App gets you started with a basic conversation between two people. You quickly start memorizing core words, use them to build sentences and phrases, and at the end of a 45-minutes module you are able to reconstruct that conversation with your own voice. It‚Äôs an effective way to learn Dutch phrases. State-of-the-art Natural Speech Recognition and Spaced Repetition Algorithms make the app effective for learning languages. Here are the key features that make Mondly a great tutor for you: - Crystal-clear audio and professional voice actors. Learn the right Dutch pronunciation from conversations between native speakers. - State-of-the-art Speech Recognition. Mondly knows exactly how to listen to your Dutch words and phrases. You will only get a positive feedback if you speak Dutch clearly and correctly. This will improve your pronunciation. - Useful phrases for real situations. Memorizing hundreds of words is not the way to go when it comes to learning Dutch. Mondly teaches you Dutch vocabulary by offering you core words and phrases. The app breaks the learning process down into bite-size chunks and puts them into themed packs of lessons. - Learn conversational Dutch. Unless you plan on reading science books, conversation is the main reason to take this free course. It will help you build a core Dutch vocabulary with widely-used nouns and verbs and speak Dutch clearly. - Verb conjugations. Conversations are fun, but the foundation of a foreign language is grammar. If you want to learn more during this course, just tap the Dutch verbs and get the full conjugation on the screen, including the translation. It‚Äôs faster and better than a dictionary. - Statistics that make sense. The App uses intelligent reporting, so you can always follow your progress. Build your vocabulary step by step and become better daily. - The Leaderboard. We made learning easy and fun, so why not throw in some more game elements, such as score? See how your friends are doing and compete with people from all over the world to become the best learner in the Mondly family. Take the Weekly Quiz to become even better. - Adaptive Learning. We wanted to craft Mondly in such a way that it will suit every learner‚Äôs needs, even complete beginners. Along the way we noticed that learning Dutch is different from person to person. So we taught the app to learn from your way of learning. After little time spent together, Mondly will understand what suits you best and it will become your own guide and customized teacher. Before you know it, at the end of these Dutch lessons, you will master the most useful 5000 words and phrases and you will be on the fast lane to learning a new language.

google.title: Drops: Learn Dutch
google.description:
What if üá≥üá± Dutch vocabulary learning would be a crazy fun game instead of boring memorisation drills? Drops makes language learning an effortless fun. Practical vocabulary is bound to your memories through beautiful graphics and quick mini-games.
The crazy part? You have only 5 mins per day. Might sound insane but works like charm! :)
These are the ingredients of the secret sauce:
üëÄ 100% illustrated: Pictures directly carry the meaning -  you don‚Äôt have to use your native language at all! No intermediary. Faster, more effective and of course more fun! :)
üèé 5 min sessions: limiting practice time sounds crazy but it it makes it incredibly addictive - which is cool thing for learning. The barrier of entry is close to zero so you can‚Äôt have any excuses: you‚Äôll have 5 minutes even on the busiest day!
üïπ Effortless play: We know why games are fun and addictive and distilled the essence into Drops. The result is a truly immersive experience but it‚Äôs not waste of your time while you play because you build a valuable knowledge.
‚ö°Qucik: Keyboard typing is painfully slow. Welcome rapid swipes and taps! Trust us, you‚Äôll need those extra seconds during the quick learning session ;)
üéØ Vocabulary only: Zero grammar, just handpicked practical words. That‚Äôs our focus and we do it extremely well. The app teaches the Korean ‚Äúalphabet‚Äù Hangul (hangoul) too!
üíÅForge a habit: Drops wants to make you language learning addict. Effectiveness is nothing without a well established habit. We help you build one!
We are extremely proud of our lovely word pronunciations by seasoned voice talents!
Drops is free for casual learners: more than 1700 words in 99 topics are all available for everyone. Hardcore language learners can subscribe for premium to progress faster with unlimited learning time. Subscriptions start from $2.99 / month.
 
üåç Our goal is to empower people of the world via language knowledge by providing a special tool that utilizes the universal language we all speak: pictures.
 
 
p.s.: be careful, this app really can get you addicted to to language learning.
 
-----------------
üòç If you love Drops as much as we enjoyed building it, please leave us a review! :)
 
Questions? Contact us at sup@languagedrops.com

google.title: Learn Dutch. Speak Dutch. Stud
google.description:
Quickly learn to speak and understand Dutch with interactive video lessons narrated in any of 146 languages.

"Affordable, responsive, easy to set up, and simple to access, Bluebird is loaded with user-friendly features and contains an enormous amount of content. This is an excellent resource for users seeking a handy, enhanced mobile experience for language learning." - Library Journal Choose from 2,000 pre-recorded lessons (over 5 years of lessons) or create a truly personalized course that revolves around the things you love. If you‚Äôre learning for your job, you can even create a personalized course for any of 60 occupations. Bluebird uses the scientifically proven spaced repetition technique, so you‚Äôll learn quickly and retain what you learn long-term. Just listen and repeat ‚Äì it‚Äôs that easy. Learn Dutch hands-free. No typing or swiping needed. Learn while you‚Äôre exercising, cooking, commuting, or relaxing at home. You can even stream your Bluebird lessons to smart speakers like Google Home or to your TV. You‚Äôll Learn: * 2,000 high frequency words. (84% of everyday speech includes these powerful words.) * The top 100 verbs ‚Äì with conjugations in the past, present, and future tenses. * How to build complete sentences on your own. * How to manage dozens of everyday situations. * How to handle complex conversations. Watch Your Progress: * 2,000 quizzes will test your knowledge and reinforce what you learn. * Each quiz contains a variety of question types to evaluate your listening, reading, and writing skills. * See your statistics for both your lessons and quizzes at any time. A Global Approach Bluebird brings language learning to the world‚Äôs population in an unprecedented way. You can learn Dutch from any of 146 narration languages. Something for Everybody Whether you‚Äôre preparing for a trip or want to learn Dutch for fun, school, or work, Bluebird will teach you what you need to know, and ensure you remember what you learn long-term. And, with family-friendly content throughout, your whole family can enjoy learning Dutch the Bluebird way. Unparalleled Content and Quality Bluebird has the most comprehensive language courses in the world, with an average of 10,000 instructional phrases per language. Each Bluebird lesson lasts between 15 and 45 minutes, with the average lesson lasting 30 minutes. Our curriculum is teacher-designed and human-translated; our narrators and actors are professional voice-over artists and native speakers of their respective languages; and our audio is studio-grade.

google.description:
Learn Dutch with Ling in just 10 minutes a day!

DOWNLOAD FREE - LEARN WITH GAMES - SPEAK WITH NATIVE SPEAKERS Our free Dutch language learning app is designed to make learning Dutch as easy and as fun as possible! Using a variety of mini-games and interactive learning techniques, you‚Äôll be able to immerse yourself in the Dutch language using just your smartphone! Whether you‚Äôre a complete beginner hoping to learn the basics of the language, or you‚Äôre already pretty fluent and want to learn even more advanced Dutch phrases, or brush up on your knowledge ‚Äì Ling has you covered! FEATURED IN Yahoo ‚Ä¢ VOGUE ‚Ä¢ Forbes ‚Ä¢ NBC Traditional Dutch language lessons can be tedious and dull. At Ling, we‚Äôve made the learning process fun by using puzzles, games, challenges, and quizzes to teach you how to read, write, speak, and understand Dutch! ------------------------------------------------------- OUR Dutch COURSE HIGHLIGHTS ------------------------------------------------------- - Flashcards to test your knowledge - Quizzes to track your progress - AI chatbot to practice daily conversations - Speaking exercises to improve your pronunciation - Finger tracing via your smartphone screen to become familiar with writing - Match pictures with the corresponding word - Put sentences into the correct order - Complete the unfinished sentence ‚Ä¶ And much, much more! With so many mini-games, challenges, quizzes, and puzzles to teach you Dutch, you‚Äôll have hours of fun learning a new language. It won‚Äôt even feel like learning at all! -------------------------------- KEY FEATURES OF LING -------------------------------- - User-friendly interface - Easy to navigate - Lessons cover the four aspects of the language (reading, writing, speaking, and listening) - Courses for all fluency levels, from absolute beginner to advanced - Mini-games, flashcards, challenges, and interactive games to help you learn faster and more effectively - All courses were created with the help of native speakers of each language - Learn helpful grammar tips while playing fun, interactive games - Learn how to write the alphabet with cutting-edge finger tracing technology - Learn how to speak about a variety of different topics Ling is available for 60+ different languages: Learn Afrikaans, Learn Albanian, Learn Arabic, Learn Armenian, Learn Bengali, Learn Bosnian, Learn Bulgarian, Learn Burmese, Learn Cantonese, Learn Chinese, Learn Croatian, Learn Czech, Learn Danish, Learn Dutch, Learn English, Learn Estonian, Learn Finnish, Learn French, Learn Georgian, Learn German, Learn Greek, Learn Hebrew, Learn Hindi, Learn Hungarian, Learn Indonesian, Learn Irish, Learn Italian, Learn Japanese, Learn Kannada, Learn Khmer, Learn Korean, Learn Lao, Learn Latvian, Learn Lithuanian, Learn Malayalam, Learn Malaysian, Learn Marathi, Learn Mongolian, Learn Nepali, Learn Norwegian, Learn Persian, Learn Polish, Learn Portuguese, Learn Punjabi, Learn Romanian, Learn Russian, Learn Serbian, Learn Slovak, Learn Slovenian, Learn Spanish, Learn Swahili, Learn Swedish, Learn Tagalog, Learn Tamil, Learn Telugu, Learn Thai, Learn Turkish, Learn Ukrainian, Learn Urdu, Learn Vietnamese Ling Subscription Plans: - Monthly: $14.99 USD - Half-yearly: $39.99 USD - Yearly: $79.99 USD - Lifetime: $149.99 USD If you have any suggestions or feedback, please contact us at support@ling-app.com. google.title: Learn Dutch with Flashcards!
google.description:
ReWord is a highly effective Dutch vocabulary app. It is your best tool to learn Dutch language and improve your vocabulary. Did you know you can learn languages just taking 5-10 minutes a day? With our interval system, your Dutch lessons will reach a new level. And will give you great results, of course!

As with any other language, Dutch lessons must include learning Dutch grammar and memorizing new Dutch words. However, one of the problems with foreign language learning is you can‚Äôt achieve good results if you don‚Äôt systematize the memorizing.
With ReWord, you get a dedicated system and will memorize new Dutch words without much effort on your part.

Features:
‚Ä¢ Thousands of Dutch words and phrases divided into thematic categories, including the most commonly used words in Dutch. Choose the category you want to learn this time and change it whenever you want.
‚Ä¢ Add your own Dutch words and categories easily: you can create your own word base you want to master first.
‚Ä¢ Handy flashcards with pictures and example sentences: helpful mental shortcuts to build your vocabulary and understand the nuances of word meaning and how these words are used in real practice.
‚Ä¢ Spaced repetitions really work: ReWord has a science-based approach to memorizing foreign words so you can learn languages at the highest efficiency.
‚Ä¢ Tracking your progress: set your daily goal and keep achieving it every day.
‚Ä¢ Offline mode: now it is possible to learn Dutch wherever you go.

Yes, with ReWord, memorizing new words is extremely easy and utterly efficient!

Use the app at least twice a day, with regular breaks every few hours. Start with just five words a day and you will have at least 1825 new words in your active vocab within a year. Increase your daily goal, take more Dutch lessons, and you will accelerate your progress and learn Dutch even faster.
ReWord ‚Äì your best Dutch learning app! We are here to help you learn languages in a hassle-free way! Start to speak Dutch!

name: Learn Dutch With Amy for Kids

google.title: Learn Dutch With Amy for Kids
google.description: Learn Dutch with fun games for kids! Children playfully learn over 180 new words at their own pace. Parents and caregivers get insight into their educational progress in the results overview. Try 3 themes for free! How can Learn Dutch With Amy help your kids? ‚Ä¢ Learn and play: challenging games (slideshow, concentration game, puzzle, and quiz). ‚Ä¢ Learn step by step: words are ordered into clear categories (Farm, Clothing, Colors, Transportation, Numbers, Shapes, Playground, Food & drinks, Zoo, Home, Body, Music, and Sports). ‚Ä¢ High-quality graphics designed by professionals. ‚Ä¢ Words are spoken by a voice over professional with a friendly female voice. ‚Ä¢ Teaches pronunciation and spelling. ‚Ä¢ Helps children learn new words they do not know yet (expanding your child's vocabulary). Listening and reading skills of children are measured by the app, and can be viewed by parents and supervisors. The results can be viewed for a limited time only. An in-app purchase allows you to view the results of the last two weeks, and allows filtering by category and skill. Learn Dutch With Amy offers several fun and interactive preschooler games that teach kids in the following areas: FARM: match cute animals from ducks to cows and learn how these words look, sound, and how to write and pronounce them correctly before kindergarten. Words: tractor, koe, kip, paard, kat, hond, eend, geit, and 5 more! CLOTHING: what do we put on today and how do you pronounce that in Dutch? Words: muts, laars, want, schoen, broek, jurk, bloes, riem, and 8 more! COLORS: your child will learn the most common colors as easy as 123. Words: zwart, bruin, rood, donkergroen, grijs, lichtblauw, lichtgroen, oranje, and 5 more! TRANSPORTATION: see and learn the different means of transportation on the road, in the water or in the sky! Words: auto, trein, vrachtwagen, vliegtuig, fiets, bus, helikopter, motor, and 5 more! NUMBERS: learning the basics of the 123s is vital for toddlers and preschool aged kids and will help later with kindergarten math. Words: nul, een, twee, drie, vier, vijf, zes, zeven, and 3 more! SHAPES: your preschooler will get to know the basic shapes by learning cute and colorful rectangles, circles, triangles, etc. Words: pijl, cirkel, hart, ovaal, rechthoek, ring, spiraal, vierkant, and 2 more! PLAYGROUND: learn how to pronounce and write the equipment of the playground in Dutch. Words: draaimolen, rekstok, klimrek, ringen, zandbak, wip, glijbaan, wipkip, and 4 more! FOOD & DRINKS: learn how to pronounce and write the names of different food and drink items from around the world and tell everyone about them! Words: appel, banaan, brood, wortel, kaas, ei, vis, vork, and 15 more! ZOO: look at the zoo animals and learn how they are written and pronounced in Dutch. Words: papegaai, leeuw, aap, zebra, olifant, giraffe, kameel, krokodil, and 8 more! HOME: apart from learning the basic shapes of everyday home appliances, your preschooler will hear the names along with their pronunciations. Words: stoel, deur, telefoon, plant, douche, trap, tafel, toilet, and 3 more! And 3 more categories! The following categories are available for free: Food & drinks, Zoo, and Body. Remaining categories are available as an in-app purchase. New games and categories regularly become available. Kindergartens use this game to decrease language delays for newcomers. Teachkidslanguages.com is a startup that aims to improve the way young children learn languages. Do you have questions or feedback? We love to hear from you! Please contact us at info@teachkidslanguages.com Visit us! https://www.teachkidslanguages.com Like us on Facebook! https://www.facebook.com/TeachKidsLanguages Follow us! https://twitter.com/TeachKidsLang Like us? If yes, please give us a review!

google.title: Nemo Dutch
google.description:
Nemo is designed to start you speaking the most useful words in Dutch immediately and confidently. With millions of downloads from around the world, Nemo is now available for Android phones and tablets.

‚úì Every Dutch word is pronounced clearly in high quality audio from a native speaker.
‚úì All audio is downloaded to your device, and is available offline or in airplane mode.
‚úì Master your accent with the Speech Studio. Simply record yourself saying a phrase and then hear your voice next to the teacher‚Äôs. Then try again. You‚Äôll be AMAZED how quickly your foreign accent melts away.
‚úì Nemo is not built around lessons at all. It is meant to be picked up throughout the day, whenever you have a few minutes to spare.
‚úì NO PRIOR KNOWLEDGE of Dutch is required.

Nemo targets the words and phrases most often used in conversation. For beginners, we‚Äôve prepared ‚ÄúIf You Only Learn 10 Things‚Äù, ‚ÄúIf You Only Learn 50 Things‚Äù, and ‚ÄúIf You Only Learn 100 Things‚Äù lists for a fast introduction to the essentials. Intermediate learners can progress to a course of the highest frequency words needed for travel and business and begin to have conversations in Dutch in a month. Advanced students will benefit most from the Speech Studio technology to correct their foreign accent.

With Nemo, you can customize flashcards to exercise the language skill you want to improve. When beginning a new topic, setup flashcards to practice translation of Dutch to English so you can build familiarity with new words. Next, switch to translate English to Dutch to train your recall and ability to speak. To complete mastery, switch to cards that specialize in fine-tuning your listening and perfecting your pronunciation.

Any card can be marked as a favorite, allowing you to make your own custom deck of cards to focus on the words of the day. Turn on Review Mode to recap what you practiced earlier in the day to boost your memory retention.

Dive into what you want to learn at any time. The phrasebook offers quick access to the vocabulary in the app through a Dutch-English dictionary interface. Nemo also functions as a translator. Simply find the words you need in the search interface and play its audio through the device speaker.

‚óÜ Get off the beaten path or find comfort with traveler phrases.
‚óÜ Build your proficiency with numbers and the most important verbs and sentence building blocks.

Dutch is the primary language used in the Netherlands (Holland) and cities such as Amsterdam, Rotterdam, Utrecht and the Hague. Dutch is very similar to Flemish, the language spoken in the northern half of Belgium.

Use your new skills to make friends, impress old friends, bring smiles to children, get out of jams, experience new things, talk confidently, and make your travel and cultural experience more rich and fulfilling.

Download this free app now!

google.title: Simpler: English learning app
google.description: Learning English is now easier than ever! Try Simpler now. SIMPLER APP is an effective and helpful tool for language learners of all levels. SIMPLER ENGLISH COURSE FEATURES ‚òÖ GRAMMAR in the form of short and simple topics ‚òÖ DETECTIVE STORIES: a fun new way to practice your English ‚òÖ Free daily access to TREASURE CHESTS with useful new words ‚òÖ Effective DRILLS for each grammar topic ‚òÖ ASSOCIATIVE word learning ‚òÖ Authentic LISTENING material Learn and master the English language FOR FREE with SIMPLER! Simpler English course includes grammar, vocabulary and speaking modules. HOW DID WE DEVELOP SUCH A SIMPLE AND EFFICIENT TOOL FOR LEARNING ENGLISH FROM SCRATCH? 1. We've developed an accessible and effective GRAMMAR COURSE for all-level learners. English grammar can be confusing and overwhelming. Good news: we've done all the hard work for you. We took the most essential and relevant grammar and broke it down into bite-sized topics complete with drills. Each topic is a simple rule or structure, which comes with an instant comprehension check. With this system you can learn English grammar from the basics, all by yourself. 2.We've created an improved FLASHCARD LIBRARY for more effective word learning. Each flashcard has a sentence which helps memorize the word using associations. The app uses spaced repetition to help you remember every word. Expand your vocabulary fast with Simpler. 3. At Simpler we know the importance of listening skills and learning the correct pronunciation from the very beginning. That's why every phrase in our exercises is voiced by a native speaker. And in our PRACTICE section you can put new grammar and vocabulary to use and role play one of the two speakers in a real-life dialogue. 4. DRILLS are one of the key elements of our course. These are grammar exercises, such as completing a sentence or typing in the translation of a phrase. The drills train you to formulate correct sentences and use new grammar without even thinking about it. Some of the previously learned grammar is regularly added to your drills to keep your memory strong. We use various types of exercises in our drills to maximize the efficiency and make them fun. 5. Subjects include math, literacy, science, engineering, art, music, and more. Kids can move at their own pace through a curated curriculum using fun toddler games, books, videos, and songs. Perfect games for 2,3,4,5,6,7,8 year olds!

MODERN LIFE SKILLS

From emotional regulation to robotics, empathy to coding ‚Äî Lingokids helps toddlers and children aged 2‚Äì8 prepare for modern life. Created for boys and girls, the app encourages creativity, mindfulness, collaboration, and resilience ‚Äî all through play.

PLAYLEARNING‚Ñ¢ METHOD
At Lingokids, we believe learning sticks when it‚Äôs wrapped in fun. Our Playlearning‚Ñ¢ method inspires toddlers and kids to discover the world naturally ‚Äî through play, repetition, and curiosity. From coloring and games to movement, stories, and songs, every interaction builds real skills.

FEATURED BRANDS & CHARACTERS
Your kids can now play with familiar favorites like Blippi and Pocoyo, all available inside the app. Plus, discover activities created with trusted names like NASA and Oxford University Press.

Many families may already know Lingokids from our videos on YouTube and YouTube Kids, where over 3 million subscribers enjoy our playful, educational content. Now, those same kids can keep learning through fun toddler games and interactive activities inside the app.

SUBJECTS, THEMES & LEVELS THAT GROW WITH YOUR CHILD

Do you want to learn English with popular movies and TV shows? Or learn Spanish by reading books with bilingual translations and adapted audiobooks?

Improve your language skills while having fun with EWA‚Äôs unique language learning methodology, featuring:

‚óè bite-sized lessons adapted for every level,
‚óè 100% binge-worthy content,
‚óè bilingual books with audio,
‚óè interactive games and features,
‚óè progress tracking, spaced repetition learning, and more!

Take your language learning to the next level with a top-reviewed language learning app. EWA is available in 35 languages and counting, and EWA has empowered over 60 million people worldwide to learn English, Spanish, French, or Italian.

üë©‚Äçüè´ Master Speaking with Movies/TV Shows

Want to learn English with your favorite movie hero or chat in Spanish to your most hated TV series villain?

EWA uses snippets from your favorite shows and movies to teach you new words and phrases in action to improve your speaking skills.

Regardless of your level, you‚Äôll quickly gain the confidence you need to start speaking with content that‚Äôs fun and unforgettable.

Choose the topic and difficulty that best fits your goals and dive into one of our courses for language levels ranging from:
‚óè Rookie
‚óè Skilled
‚óè Advanced
‚óè Travel
‚óè Business
‚óè Grammar etc.

**We‚Äôre constantly expanding our library of courses to deliver you unique language learning options. Stay tuned for updates!**

üìö Improve Your Reading and Pronunciation with over 10,000 Books
Explore our extensive library in English, French, German, Italian, and Spanish! Expand & boost your vocabulary, master complex grammar, and perfect your pronunciation. 

Here‚Äôs how it works:

‚óè Pick your difficulty (Rookie to Advanced)
‚óè Choose a genre you love
‚óè Wow - You‚Äôre reading your first book in a new language!

Enjoy a wide selection of audiobooks that will help you start sounding like a native in no time! We‚Äôve picked the most exciting, adventurous, spicy, hilarious titles - adapted for your level.

üó£ Oxford Topics Dialogues

Don't know what to say at passport control, how to ask for directions or order food at a caf√©? üèÜ Solidify Your Knowledge and Compete in Our Leaderboard

If you have trouble remembering what you just learned - EWA is the perfect app for you. With EWA, you can be certain that what you learn sticks! EWA also keeps you motivated by allowing you to track your progress and compete against language learners.

The more you learn a new language, the better you get, and the higher you climb up EWA‚Äôs Leaderboard.Motivate yourself to stay on track with your learning, and you‚Äôll soon be hitting those top spots!

EWA features a selection of free content, but an EWA subscription is required in order to access all courses and learning features. Please note: available courses may vary depending on your device‚Äôs language. Once purchased, subscriptions will automatically renew unless canceled before the end of the current payment period. If you have any concerns, recommendations, or complaints just drop us a line at support@appewa.com and we‚Äôll work towards making EWA better!

google.description: Learn English with free lessons daily. Let Mondly teach you the English language quickly and effectively. In just minutes you‚Äôll start memorizing core English words, form sentences, learn to speak English phrases and take part in conversations. Fun English lessons improve your vocabulary, grammar and pronunciation like no other language learning method. Beginner or advanced learner, traveler or business professional with a tight schedule? The app works great and dynamically adjusts to your needs. Explore language exercises for reading, listening, writing and speaking enhanced with a dictionary, verb conjugator and state-of-the-art speech recognition technology - you‚Äôll feel like having your own English language tutor in your pocket. Download the language learning pill today and enjoy the benefits of learning a new language for life. The secret path to language learning Remember the English language classes in school? You started with hundreds of basic words and expressions, continued with tons of English grammar lessons and at the end of a full semester‚Äôs language course you could barely translate a sentence or say ‚ÄúHello!‚Äù to a foreigner. That‚Äôs the traditional way to learn a language. Mondly has a different approach, that‚Äôs opposite to the average language course. This is how the future of language courses looks like The App gets you started with a basic conversation between two people. You quickly start memorizing core words, use them to build sentences and phrases, and at the end of a 45-minutes module you are able to reconstruct that conversation with your own voice. It‚Äôs an effective way to learn English phrases. State-of-the-art Natural Speech Recognition and Spaced Repetition Algorithms make the app effective for learning languages. Here are the key features that make Mondly a great tutor for you: Crystal-clear audio and professional voice actors. Learn the right English pronunciation from conversations between native speakers. State-of-the-art Speech Recognition. Mondly knows exactly how to listen to your English words and phrases. You will only get a positive feedback if you speak English clearly and correctly. This will improve your pronunciation. Useful phrases for real situations. Memorizing hundreds of isolated words is not the way to go when it comes to learning English. Mondly teaches you English vocabulary by offering you core words and phrases. The app breaks the learning process down into short lessons and puts them into themed packs. Learn conversational English. Conversation is the main reason to take this free course. It will help you build a core English vocabulary with widely-used nouns and verbs, and speak English clearly. Verb conjugations. If you want to learn more during this course, just tap the English verbs and get the full conjugation on the screen, including the translation. It‚Äôs faster and better than a dictionary. Advanced Statistics. The App uses intelligent reporting, so you can always follow your progress. Build your vocabulary step by step and become better daily. The Leaderboard. See how your friends are doing and compete with people from all over the world to become the best learner in the Mondly community family. Take the Weekly Quiz to become even better. Adaptive Learning. Learning English is different from person to person. So we taught the app to learn from your way of learning. After little time spent together, Mondly will understand what suits you best and it will become your own guide and customized teacher. Before you know it, at the end of these English lessons, you will master the most useful 5000 words and phrases and you will be on the fast lane to learning a new language.
