google.title: Wlingua - Learn English
google.description:
Learning English has never been so easy. It's perfect for you, whether you already have a beginner, basic, intermediate, or advanced level of English. Thanks to our online English courses, you‚Äôll notice your English improving very quickly. Millions of students have already tried our courses. Would you like to join them?

Our Online English Courses:

English Course In this course you will learn English from scratch. Guaranteed! Regardless of the level you start from, it is designed to help you learn English from day one. Advanced English Course In this course, you will continue to improve your English until you master it like a native. An advanced English course with detailed explanations written in English that will leave you speechless. Ideal for challenge lovers. B2 First Course This course is designed for people who are going to take the B2 First exam. You will find a multitude of practices for the sections of the test like, Use of English, Reading, and Listening. English Irregular Verbs Course In this course you will practice irregular English verbs. This is extra practice recommended for people who are already doing the General English course. British and American English Pronunciation Courses The English alphabet has 26 letters, but more than 40 different sounds! In the pronunciation courses you will be able to learn to distinguish them, see example words of each of them, and practice all of them using various exercises. English Phrasal Verbs Course In this course you will study the most used phrasal verbs in everyday life. You will learn the meaning of more than 290 phrasal verbs and will be provided with example sentences and extra practice exercises. Designed for people who are already in the last level of the General English course, and who can already get by with English. All explanations are in English. And much more‚Ä¶ You will also find additional courses to improve your English in the workplace. On the Phone Course Writing Course Speaking Course Logistics Course

Our Learning Method:

A learning process designed for you that is both easy and guided: You‚Äôll feel like you‚Äôre learning more and more English every day. Every sentence, exercise, review, and reading has been carefully selected for you. Audio clips in British English and American English: A wide variety of accents with clear, crisp pronunciation. Recorded by professional narrators. Linked concepts: Each word is linked to its use or precise meaning. When you click on the words in each sentence, exercise, or reading, their meaning or an explanation of their use will appear. Vocabulary: Learn the meaning, pronunciation, and use of words with activities adapted to your progress. Grammar exercises: Practice your grammar with exercises linked to explanations. Vocabulary topics: Words are grouped by topic categories. Spaced reviews: Review the vocabulary and grammar at increasingly long intervals. Search function: Find whatever you‚Äôre looking for, including vocabulary and grammar. Reading comprehension texts (readings): Learn and practice with conversations, news, emails, and interviews, among others. Certificates: Earn a certificate that proves your knowledge at the end of each level. Account types: ‚úî Basic: With a Basic account, the course is free, but has some limitations. ‚úî Premium: With a Premium account, you‚Äôll have access to all course content and activities. Download our app to learn English!

ABOUT WALL STREET ENGLISH

google.title: Cake - Learn English & Korean
google.description: An incredible English & Korean learning app used by 100 million people worldwide. Master your English & Korean using free videos and audio content updated daily! We currently only support English for learning Korean. But don't worry! More languages will be added soon! You can learn real English expressions selected by English experts. Practice your speaking and revise what you learned with quizzes. Practice and repetition will make memorizing the expressions simple! Continuous learning with Cake will definitely help improve your English & Korean skills. It's fun. - Learn with your favorite celebrity, artist, and vlogger videos. - It's also full of exciting original content made by us. You can learn real native English. - Learn real English used in vlogs, movies, and TV shows. - Become familiar with different accents and pronunciations. - You can learn how to express one sentence in many different ways. Cake will help you improve your speaking. - Watch videos with subtitles, and repeat after each line. - Get your pronunciation checked by our AI. - Practice speaking like in a real conversation. Learn step-by-step. - Select a topic of your choice and study step-by-step with our 'class' feature. - Study using the 'classes' created by English experts. - You can practice speaking and listening like in real conversations. Repeat and revise. - Review what you learned using fun quizzes. - Save the sentences you like, and test yourself. Just 10 minutes a day. - Achieve your daily study goals, and feel accomplished. - The more accomplished you feel, the more motivated you'll feel to keep learning! Cake's exclusive features - Daily expression clips: New expressions are added daily, and are organized by topic. - Original lectures: English & Korean lectures created by Cake - Classes: Enables you to study step-by-step by combining lectures, videos, and quizzes into several courses. - Quizzes: Listening, key expressions, reviews, and many more revision quizzes. - Speak: Practice listening and speaking with audio learning. - Today's conversation: Practice listening and speaking with a unique conversation every day. - Save sentences and words: Practice and repeat sentences and words of your choice. Improve your learning with Cake Plus. Get unlimited hearts and enjoy the app with no ads. Access exclusive Cake Plus content, and save as many words and sentences as you want. Real English expressions selected by English experts! Use Cake daily and watch your English improve!

google.title: Andy English Language Learning
google.description:
Dive into the world of language learning with Andy, your personal English learning app. Whether you‚Äôre a beginner or an advanced learner, Andy offers an interactive way to learn English easily and effectively.

WHY CHOOSE ANDY?

‚óè Personalized English Tutoring: Andy isn't just an app; he's your friend. He provides a hands-on approach to English speaking and comprehension, ensuring you practice English in real-life situations.

‚óè Engage in English Conversation: From casual greetings to deep discussions about art, travel, and movies, practicing English conversation with Andy feels like chatting with a friend. It's a stress-free environment, as Andy, unlike humans, doesn‚Äôt judge. This is the perfect place to practice without feeling shy.

‚óè Master the English Vocabulary: Stumble upon a word you don‚Äôt recognize? Just ask Andy! Not only will you receive a definition, but also examples to ensure you remember it. Regular reminders will help reinforce your vocabulary.

‚óè In-Depth Grammar Lessons: Forget about boring grammar lessons. Andy delivers bite-sized daily lessons, testing your understanding, and providing feedback. Each English learning session is interactive, ensuring you grasp the concepts.

‚óè Learn Languages Beyond English: While Andy specializes in English, the methodology used can pave the way for you to learn languages beyond just English. After all, the best way to learn - languages is through practice.

‚óè Available Anytime: Whether you have 5 minutes or 5 hours, Andy is always there. Learn English for free at your pace, and work on your listening skills with message audios.

‚óè A Fun Experience: It‚Äôs not just about learning. Andy brings humor, curiosity, and a personal touch to the table. It feels like you're talking to a real person.

A DEEPER DIVE INTO ANDY'S METHODOLOGY

Andy is built upon the latest in language learning methodologies. This ensures a seamless blend of real-world conversation practice, structured lessons, and innovative technology. The design ensures you not only learn English easily but also retain what you learn.

PRACTICE MAKES PERFECT

With Andy, you‚Äôre not just learning; you‚Äôre constantly practicing. This regular practice ensures you‚Äôre always improving, whether it‚Äôs your English vocabulary or your conversational skills. The more you use Andy, the closer you get to mastering the English language.

A COMMUNITY OF LEARNERS

Join a global community of users who share your passion. Share tips, discuss nuances, or just engage in a fun English conversation. The community, along with Andy, makes learning feel less like a task and more like a fun group activity.

A JOURNEY, NOT A DESTINATION

Remember, language learning is not about reaching an end goal but about the journey. Enjoy the process, relish the challenges, and celebrate the small victories. With Andy, every day is a step closer to fluency in English and understanding the nuances of language.

STAY UPDATED WITH ANDY

Our team is continuously working to improve and expand Andy's capabilities. From adding new English vocabulary lessons to enhancing its conversational abilities, we ensure Andy remains the best free language learning app. Stay tuned for regular updates and new features that aim to make your language learning journey even more enriching!

google.title: Wlingua - Learn Spanish
google.description:
Learning Spanish has never been so easy. It's perfect for you, whether you already have a beginner, basic, intermediate, or advanced level of Spanish. Thanks to our online Spanish courses, you‚Äôll notice your Spanish improving very quickly. Millions of students have already tried our courses. Would you like to join them?

Our Online Spanish Courses:

Spanish Course In this course you will learn Spanish from scratch. Guaranteed! Regardless of the level you start from, it is designed to help you learn Spanish from day one. Spanish Verb Conjugation Course In this course you will practice the conjugation of Spanish verb tenses. This is extra practice recommended for people who are already doing the General Spanish course. It includes regular and irregular verbs. On the Phone Course In this course you will learn to answer the phone naturally. You will learn the most important phrases and expressions to have a telephone conversation. European Spanish Pronunciation Course In this course you will learn to recognize Castilian or European Spanish sounds. This course has 15 lessons and many exercises to practice and improve your pronunciation. Mexican Spanish Pronunciation Course In this course you will learn to recognize Mexican Spanish sounds. This course has 15 lessons and many exercises to practice and improve your pronunciation. Ser or Estar Course In this course you will learn how and when to use the verbs ser and estar. Each lesson contains explanations, examples and exercises to practice these crucial verbs. You will learn which adjective goes with each verb or several expressions used in everyday conversations.

Our Learning Method:

A learning process designed for you that is both easy and guided: You‚Äôll feel like you‚Äôre learning more and more Spanish every day. Every sentence, exercise, review, and reading has been carefully selected for you. Audio clips in European Spanish and Mexican Spanish: A wide variety of accents with clear, crisp pronunciation. Recorded by professional narrators. Linked concepts: Each word is linked to its use or precise meaning. When you click on the words in each sentence, exercise, or reading, their meaning or an explanation of their use will appear. Lesson structure: Concepts are introduced progressively throughout the course. Only concepts that are explained in the course are used to create the content (sentences, exercises or readings). Vocabulary: Learn the meaning, pronunciation, and use of words with activities adapted to your progress. Grammar exercises: Practice your grammar with exercises linked to explanations. Vocabulary topics: Words are grouped by topic categories. Spaced reviews: Review the vocabulary and grammar at increasingly long intervals. Search function: Find whatever you‚Äôre looking for, including vocabulary and grammar. Reading comprehension texts (readings): Learn and practice with conversations, news, emails, and interviews, among others. Certificates: Earn a certificate that proves your knowledge at the end of each level. Account types: ‚úî Basic: With a Basic account, the course is free, but has some limitations. ‚úî Premium: With a Premium account, you‚Äôll have access to all course content and activities. At Wlingua, we work hard every day to offer you a quality Spanish app that will help you in your work, with that upcoming exam, on your vacation, in communicating with people from around the world... Download our app to learn Spanish!

google.description: Learn Spanish from 61 native languages, for free & offline, with FunEasyLearn. Learn to READ üìñ WRITE ‚úç and SPEAK Spanish üí¨ Discover the fun & easy way to learn all the reading rules, all the words you‚Äôll ever need and all the useful phrases in the Spanish language. üöÄ Contents ‚Ä¢ 6,000 Spanish words (constantly growing): the most common nouns, verbs, adjectives, etc., categorized into 7 levels and 200 topics; ‚Ä¢ 5,000 Spanish phrases (frequently used): the most important phrases for daily conversations and travelling, categorized into 10 levels and 120 topics. Enhance your vocabulary by learning words, sentences and expressions for beginner, intermediate and advanced learners. üîî Why learn Spanish with FunEasyLearn? FunEasyLearn reinvents language learning. Our team of linguists and teachers have developed a unique language learning strategy. The secret lies in combining an alphabet with all the reading rules, all the necessary words and a practical phrasebook into one app. This allows our users to read a word or phrase, pronounce it correctly, associate it with an illustration and practice it with listening, writing and speaking games. üèÜ Top features Hand-drawn illustrations ‚Äì memorize the new vocabulary faster with intuitive illustrations; Professional audio recordings ‚Äì listen to audios recorded by native speakers; Detailed statistics ‚Äì analyze your results and track your progress; Review manager ‚Äì review everything you learn; Smart search ‚Äì find quickly the words and phrases you need; Hide what you know ‚Äì hide the content you already know; Speech recognition ‚Äì improve your pronunciation; Offline ‚Äì use the app anywhere in the world, with no internet connection. üíº Spanish for business Get access to special Spanish lessons created for your business. We provide specialized courses for taxi drivers, hotel & restaurant staffs, flight-attendants, shop-assistants, etc. ‚úà Spanish for travelling Learn how to book a hotel room, order a meal in a restaurant, ask for directions, carry out a conversation and speak confidently with the native speakers. üôå Spanish for adults We adapt the contents depending on the age of the learner. google.title: Learn Spanish for beginners
google.description:
Learn Spanish and have fun! The educational game for beginners!

Discover the most exciting way to learn Spanish with our application, specifically designed for beginners. Whether you're starting from scratch or looking to improve your basic skills, our app offers you a unique and effective learning experience.

36 fun themes and 3 levels of difficulty:
From the basics like the alphabet and numbers to advanced topics like sports and music.

500 words with images and audio: Expand your vocabulary with essential words, accompanied by clear images and audio pronunciation.

Interactive lessons and continuous assessments: Our game provides you with a comprehensive learning experience with interactive lessons and exercises for reading, writing, and conversation. Strengthen your skills in each topic and assess your progress with specific exams and tests, allowing you to consolidate what you have learned and see your language proficiency effectively.

Spanish accent: Clear and modern pronunciation, ideal for understanding and being understood in international contexts by a native speaker from Spain.

Ideal for travelers and support in rehabilitation: If you are planning a trip abroad or looking for a friendly and accessible tool to assist in cognitive rehabilitation situations, our app is perfect. It is widely used by older individuals, those with speech difficulties, and in hospital settings to assist stroke patients in their recovery process and Spanish language learning.

Quickly and confidently: Our course has been designed to provide you with an immersive experience, allowing you to learn Spanish quickly and effectively. Perfect for beginners, our app helps you build a strong foundation in the language.

Goodbye to the dictionary and translation: With our methodology, you won't need to rely on a dictionary or translation tool soon. We provide you with all the necessary tools to understand and be understood in this language.

Play and Learn with a User-Friendly Interface: Our application combines learning with play, making studying Spanish fun and engaging. With an intuitive and easy-to-use interface, we make it easy to navigate between various lessons, activities, and tests, ensuring an enjoyable and efficient learning experience for all users.

Customize your learning experience: With a variety of themes and levels, you can choose what interests you the most. Our tracking system allows you to see your progress and focus on areas for improvement.

More languages with us: we offer courses in French, English, Portuguese, Italian, German, and Chinese

Copyright:
IMPORTANT: We are owners and have copyright of all sounds words
Images have been obtained under licensed Creative Commons CC0

google.title: Learn Spanish. Speak Spanish
google.description: Speak Spanish faster than you ever imagined with Mondly‚Äôs proprietary ILA-method. How? The secret is to make it simple. Have you ever heard a song in the radio which had you bopping your head and wanting to sing along? The first step of learning Spanish is pretty similar. You listen to the sound of native Spanish speakers and repeat some of their words. Mondly‚Äôs state-of-the-art speech recognition shows you how well you already speak and where you can improve. It‚Äôs fun and doesn‚Äôt even feel like learning. Especially because Mondly uses your mother language so you never get lost in translation. The second step is even easier. Take a break. Your lesson is never more than 9 minutes long and here is why: Your brain needs a rest to store the new information. And while you‚Äôre busy with your life, Spanish words and sentences get anchored in your long-term memory. The result: You find yourself effortlessly knowing what to say and when. Don‚Äôt worry about the exact timing. Mondly gives you control over the entire process. You receive friendly reminders exactly when your brain is set for the next dose of knowledge. The third step is all about you. Because now you‚Äôre ready to create your own phrases and adding your individual touch and personality back into the conversation. And when you want to practice, Mondly‚Äôs interactive chat-bot becomes your pocket tutor. There are over 40 practical, real-life situations which take you to the restaurant, shopping, exploring the city and many more. But that‚Äôs not the only reason why Mondly gives you the confidence to speak Spanish. Because the HandsFree mode lets you practice without looking at the screen. Just connect your headphones and you‚Äôre in Paris, chatting away with the locals. Need a quick boost of motivation? Check your progress with the advanced statistics and intelligent reporting. It shows you how far you have come in your journey to master the 5,000 words and phrases Mondly offers you. We all learn in different ways so here are some of the other highlights Mondly offers: ‚Ä¢ Well-structured grammar drills which integrate seamlessly into the content of the lessons ‚Ä¢ Verb conjugations to show you the underlining structure and further boost your confidence ‚Ä¢ Reading and writing games to complete your skills and give you full independence So what does the ILA-Method stand for? It‚Äôs Immersive Language Acquisition and it means with Mondly you pick up Spanish in the most natural way possible. But don‚Äôt trust the over 50 million users who have given the app a 4.7/5.0 rating. Here‚Äôs what the press had to say: ¬ª ‚ÄúThe new and sexier way to learn languages‚Äù - Huffington Post ¬ª ‚ÄúClosest thing to actual immersion‚Äù - TNW ¬ª ‚ÄúA practical approach to language learning likely to be widely adopted.‚Äù - Forbes ¬ª ‚ÄúThe new way to learn languages‚Äù - Inc.com Join the revolution and speak Spanish now! There‚Äôs a new free lesson every day and no ads.

12/10/'24 Nieuwe update valt eigenlijk tegen, de layout maar vooral ook de 'globe' op het einde van de les. Bij omgekeerd vertalen van Spaans naar het Nederlands krijgt men nu Spaans.., is misschien net de bedoeling..(?) 23/12/'24 Het wordt blijkbaar steeds erger met jullie updates, nu ook nog ongevraagde pop-up schermen. Ben ook ongevraagd uitgelogd na update! Best dus (op Google Play) automatische updates uitschakelen indien je een versie hebt die behoorlijk werkt..

In de lesjes zitten keiharde fouten. Een correctie doorgeven is sinds kort ook onmogelijk, dus geen terugkoppeling. Al vaker heb ik opmerkingen geplaatst, maar er wordt niets mee gedaan. Je krijgt hierdoor wel minder punten en om deze reden zal ik niet meer de betaalde versie nemen. Na de laatste update worden de zinnen niet meer helemaal uitgesproken, dan hoor je het woord van de volgende vraag er doorheen. Dit is geen verbetering.

De laatste update heeft nog enkele bugs in de programmering. Daarnaast is een irritante popup ingebouwd die telkens voor een paar seconden in beeld verschijnt als je 5 punten hebt verdient. Totaal zinloze toevoeging in de app.
Leuk om Spaans te leren. Vlot en gemakkelijk

google.title: ConjuGato: Learn Spanish Verbs
google.description: ConjuGato is your perfect Spanish language learning app to easily master verb conjugations. Whether you're a beginner just starting to learn Spanish or aiming to quickly improve your skills, ConjuGato makes grammar practice enjoyable and efficient. Build your vocabulary, enhance your Spanish pronunciation, and learn verbs effectively with convenient flashcards ‚Äì ideal for quick practice anytime, even offline. Why choose ConjuGato? ‚Ä¢ NEW: Guides for each tense and verb form ‚Ä¢ Flexible Practice: Customize verb exercises by irregularity, endings, or popularity ‚Ä¢ Conjugation tables for each verb, with highlighted irregular forms ‚Ä¢ Spaced repetition algorithm for efficient exam preparation and long-term retention ‚Ä¢ Mnemonic flashcards to learn similar verbs together, ideal for beginners! ‚Ä¢ Audio Pronunciation: Listen to Spanish phonetics for all the verb forms ‚Ä¢ Argentinian and Chilean voseo forms ‚Ä¢ Dark Mode for late night studying üåô ‚Ä¢ No ads, no internet connection required: A distraction-free, offline experience ConjuGato was created by a two-person team who moved to Chile without speaking Spanish. Back then, even basic verb conjugation was challenging, and we couldn't find a good app to practice effectively. Out of necessity, we developed ConjuGato to make speaking and learning Spanish easier. It dramatically improved our Spanish skills, and now thousands of learners have successfully used it too ‚Äì just check out all those 5-star reviews! ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê Free version to master Spanish language essentials: ‚Ä¢ 250 most popular verbs + additional 27 mnemonic flashcards ‚Ä¢ Indicative mood ‚Ä¢ Present and Preterite tenses ‚Ä¢ Present progressive (continuous) verb forms If you need more advanced practice, there‚Äôs an affordable one-time upgrade that unlocks everything in the app forever! ‚Ä¢ 1000 verbs + additional 104 mnemonic flashcards ‚Ä¢ All moods: Indicative, Subjunctive, Imperative ‚Ä¢ Complete tense coverage: Present, Preterite, Imperfect, Pluperfect, Conditional, Future (plus perfect and progressive forms) ‚Ä¢ No subscriptions or hidden fees! This app is suitable for both Spanish as it‚Äôs spoken in Spain and also Latin American dialects ‚Äî just disable ‚Äòvosotros‚Äô and you are good to go. üéì Download ConjuGato now and learn Spanish verbs and conjugation with ease!

google.title: LearnSpanish for Kids Game App
google.description:
A Spanish language learning platform for kids based on game design and beautiful interactive stories. Our fun game and engaging tales will help children learn Spanish through adventures filled with magical characters. Using kids‚Äô natural love of gameplay and storytelling makes language learning fun and easy. Interactive stories and games are infused with a unique methodology that enables your child to acquire Spanish skills while they listen and play!

-> Download it today FOR FREE and learn Spanish while trying one of our beautiful interactive stories!
-> Subscribe to our monthly or discounted annual plan to gain unlimited access to all the interactive stories, gameplay, rewards, and new content!
-> Available for tablets and mobile devices.
-> We love hearing from our customers! Email us at support@fabulingua.com with feedback or questions.

WINNER of Launchpad global ‚ÄúBest New Language Education Technology‚Äù award organized by the Language Flagship Technology Innovation Center.

WINNER of Fast Company‚Äôs "Innovation by Design" Award

Main Features:

‚Ä¢ ‚ÄúPlay to Learn‚Äù - An interactive, story-based mobile game to engage kids and learn Spanish.
‚Ä¢ An adaptive learning path that develops progressive language skills - comprehension, pronunciation, grammar, and literacy.
‚Ä¢ Science-backed ‚ÄúMagical Translations‚Äù learning method based on ‚Äúcomprehensible input.‚Äù
‚Ä¢ A growing collection of beautiful, interactive language-learning stories.
‚Ä¢ New features for stories and games that are added regularly.
‚Ä¢ Fun free play and games that reinforce knowledge.
‚Ä¢ A free reward system that incentivizes and motivates learning.
‚Ä¢ Audio recording mode that allows the child to practice pronunciation and develop reading skills.
‚Ä¢ Unique playing cards and free collectible digital stickers.
‚Ä¢ Parental controls and progress tracking.
‚Ä¢ MAGICAL TRANSLATIONS- An innovative way to teach Spanish to kids:
Through our Magical Translations‚Ñ¢ method, children see only the Spanish text but hear the narrator‚Äôs rhythmic (and strategically timed) alternation between Spanish and English translation. Our method is supported by Dr. Stephen Krashen‚Äôs Comprehensible Input Hypothesis. Simply put, ‚Äúcomprehensible input‚Äù is new-language input that can be comprehended by listeners despite them not understanding all the words.

This theory and our method are most effective when applied during early childhood when children‚Äôs brains will wire more efficiently to the languages they are exposed to.

FabuLingua is: A story. A game. A tool for language learning. A gentle introduction to a second language. A way to reinforce and supplement literacy. A parent-child bonding activity. An after-school plan. A super fun method for language learning!

And the best part? Any parent or teacher - whether you speak a second language or not - can do it. Lean back and enjoy the journey with your child while they learn Spanish.

ADVANTAGES OF LEARNING SPANISH DURING CHILDHOOD

#1 Language learning benefits early brain development, especially executive functioning, such as problem-solving, focusing, and switching between tasks efficiently.

#2 Studies by Harvard University suggest that learning languages early has advantages over doing it later in life, such as enhanced creativity and critical thinking skills.

#3 It provides academic and professional advantages, cultural awareness, emotional intelligence, and self-confidence.

#4 In an increasingly globalized world, new languages acquire exponential value. An estimated 130 million people in the USA will speak Spanish over the next 30 years.

#5 In the case of Spanish and Hispanic heritage families, Spanish will allow their children to understand their background, bond with relatives better, and connect to their culture.

FabuLingua is a magical source of Spanish learning for kids. It helps them learn Spanish through engaging interactive stories and innovative language learning activities, making the process enjoyable and effective. Try it for free!

google.title: Vocabulary.com
google.description:
With its uniquely effective word learning system, the Vocabulary.com app helps you master words through a fun and addictive game. And it‚Äôs powered by the world's smartest, fastest dictionary. From the makers of the award-winning Vocabulary.com website, this app will expand your vocabulary with lightning speed!

IT‚ÄôS A SCIENCE...
Vocabulary.com is a comprehensive program for lifelong learning of vocabulary, in which each activity is specially chosen for you.

‚Ä¢ We use sophisticated algorithms to help you learn more effectively.
‚Ä¢ We start with 235,858 questions that teach 15,914 words.
‚Ä¢ We use the science of learning to model how you learn (and retain) new words.
‚Ä¢ By comparing your answers to the hundreds of millions of answers given by other Vocabulary.com users, we personalize your learning experience and choose the best question for you at just the right time.

...AND IT‚ÄôS A GAME
We‚Äôve turned learning vocabulary into an addictive game. You may not even notice that you‚Äôre learning along the way.

‚Ä¢ Accumulate points, achievements and badges.
‚Ä¢ Compete with Vocabulary.com users from throughout the world.

YOU CHOOSE...
Studying for an exam like the SAT, GRE, or TOEFL? We have learnable lists for you, covering everything from standardized tests to breaking news ‚Äî you name it.

‚Ä¢ Choose from one of our 50,000 ready-to-learn lists.
‚Ä¢ Or if you see a word in the dictionary that you want to learn, just click "learn this word" and we'll teach it to you.

...OR WE CHOOSE
Don't have a specific word or list in mind? Let our adaptive learning system find the right word for you.

‚Ä¢ Just play a few questions, and we'll pinpoint the words that are appropriate for your level.
‚Ä¢ We won't waste your time on words that are too easy or too hard.

YOU IMPROVE
Like a good coach, Vocabulary.com won‚Äôt give up on you. Whether you pick the words or let us find them for you, we‚Äôll work with you until you've mastered them.

And even after you've achieved mastery, we'll continue to reinforce what you have learned to make sure that it all stays fresh in your memory. Next thing you know, you‚Äôll be expanding your vocabulary and improving your communication, a key to success in school and business.

FINALLY, A DICTIONARY WITH A SOUL
Our dictionary was written for humans, by humans. Look up a word, and you‚Äôll read a friendly explanation that you'll actually remember. It‚Äôs as if your favorite teacher were explaining it to you.

We include clever usage tips and thousands of real-world example sentences that'll show you how words live in the wild and will make you more confident about using them yourself.

See a word you‚Äôd like to know better? Tap "Learn this Word" and easily add it to your learning program.

WHAT PEOPLE ARE SAYING
"Vocabulary.com is among the quickest and most intelligent ways for students to improve their vocabulary. Regardless of education level or age, Vocabulary.com will help master the words that are essential to academic and business success." ‚ÄîNational Education Association

‚ÄúEducators who are familiar with Vocabulary.com are impressed by the technology. It is a sign, they say, that real progress is finally being made in computer-assisted education.‚Äù  ‚ÄîThe New York Times

‚ÄúVocabulary.com could actually make speaking well cool again.‚Äù ‚ÄîTIME

‚ÄúVocabulary.com boasts a Web-based dashboard bristling with points, levels, progress bars and achievement bonuses, among other attractions.‚Äù ‚ÄîUSA Today

HONORS AND AWARDS
‚Ä¢ TIME‚Äôs 50 Best Websites of the Year
‚Ä¢ PC Magazine's Top 100 Websites of the Year
‚Ä¢ Tech & Learning Award of Excellence
‚Ä¢ Webby Awards: Official Honoree in Education

google.title: Woor. English vocabulary
google.description:
W√∂√∂r is a smart English vocabulary and dictionary app built for learners who want real progress ‚Äî not just memorization.
It helps you collect, understand, and master English words with clear meanings, translations, and adaptive exercises powered by spaced repetition.

üåç Build real vocabulary, not word lists
Add any English word and W√∂√∂r automatically finds definitions, translations, and real examples from trusted dictionary sources. You‚Äôll see usage, part of speech, pronunciation, and related phrases ‚Äî everything that helps you understand and remember the word deeply.

üß† Adaptive learning system
W√∂√∂r creates personalized vocabulary exercises for you ‚Äî flashcards, quizzes, gap-fill, and typing tasks. The app tracks your progress and reviews words when you‚Äôre about to forget them. It‚Äôs a smarter way to master new vocabulary and keep it in long-term memory.

üß© Your personal dictionary
Every word you add becomes part of your own dictionary ‚Äî with meanings you‚Äôve selected, examples you understand, and progress you can see. W√∂√∂r helps you grow from knowing a word to using it naturally in writing, reading, and speaking.

üéØ For professionals, students, and test takers
Whether you‚Äôre:
a software engineer learning tech vocabulary,
a doctor or nurse preparing for OET or clinical work,
a lawyer learning legal English,
a student studying for IELTS, TOEFL, or Cambridge exams,
or a professional improving business vocabulary ‚Äî
W√∂√∂r adapts to your field and learning goals.

üìö Learn with curated word lists
Explore preset vocabulary lists made for different professions and exams. Copy lists or single words into your own collection. Each list supports active learning and personalized review cycles.

üßë‚Äçüè´ Made for teachers and teams
Tutors can create and share vocabulary lists with students. Teams can build shared dictionaries for specific projects or industries. W√∂√∂r supports collaboration and consistent vocabulary growth.

üåê Multilingual translations
W√∂√∂r supports translations from English into 22 languages ‚Äî including Spanish, Hindi, Arabic, Indonesian, Vietnamese, and more. Perfect for bilingual learners and professionals working in multilingual environments.

üí° Why learners love W√∂√∂r
- Combines dictionary precision with smart vocabulary training
- Builds deeper understanding through examples and context
- Tracks your vocabulary growth and learning progress
- Works offline after setup

W√∂√∂r is your intelligent English vocabulary and dictionary companion ‚Äî built for learners who want to understand, remember, and use words with confidence.

google.title: Grammarly-AI Writing Assistant
google.description: Edit and correct your grammar, spelling, punctuation, and more with your personal writing assistant, grammar checker, and editor. The Grammarly writing app and proofreader allows you to write clearly, confidently, and mistake-free in all your apps. Advanced features such as the AI-powered rewrite tool help you enhance your vocabulary, spell check words, and improve your writing - from emails to social media posts. Grammarly grammar checker and editor - how does it work? Simply download Grammarly and start typing in any app. Grammarly will check each word, your grammar, spelling, punctuation, and tone, and help you improve your communication skills. Whether you‚Äôre typing emails on the go, editing an important LinkedIn post, sending a text message, or composing an essential tweet, the Grammarly writing assistant and grammar checker lets you spell check, correct, edit and perfect your message from your mobile device with confidence. Leveraging the power of generative AI, Grammarly allows you to easily rewrite your messages by composing new versions for you to choose from. Simply select the rewrite option that makes your writing more descriptive, confident, formal - and much more! Grammarly works with any Android keyboard, such as Gboard or SwiftKey, so you‚Äôll never have to switch keyboards when you need help writing that important email, text, or social post. Edit, spell check, and correct your writing in real time ‚Äì Grammar checker: Know your grammar is always mistake-free. ‚Äì Spelling checker and proofreader: Easily avoid common typos. ‚Äì Advanced punctuation correction: Take the guesswork out of punctuation. Writing assistant and proofreader: Improve your communication skills ‚Äì Receive short, clear explanations for every correction. ‚Äì Understand your mistakes and avoid them in the future. Improve your writing through GenAI - Select your text and click ‚Äúimprove it‚Äù to see GenAI-created new versions - Choose versions to shorten, add more description, sound more confident, and more! *** Uplevel Your Communication Skills With Premium *** Take your writing and communication skills from good to great with our advanced features and suggestions. Grammarly Premium helps you strike the right tone, gives you real-time feedback, and helps you broaden your vocabulary by suggesting impactful, vivid words to help your message, social media post, or email come to life. Premium features include: ‚úì Vocabulary enhancement ‚úì Clarity improvements ‚úì Tone adjustments ‚úì Word choice ‚úì Formality level ‚úì Fluency **************** We designed the Grammarly mobile app to be a writing assistant that works anywhere you write‚Äîno copying or pasting required, no proofreader needed. For any inquiries regarding the deactivation of the Grammarly Keyboard for Android, please refer to this article: https://support.grammarly.com/hc/en-us/articles/25038364027661--The-Grammarly-Keyboard-for-Android-will-be-discontinued Grammarly always keeps your writing safe and private. See our User Trust Guidelines for details: https://www.grammarly.com/trust By installing Grammarly‚Äôs mobile app, you agree to Grammarly‚Äôs Terms and Conditions (www.grammarly.com/terms) and acknowledge that you have read Grammarly‚Äôs Privacy Policy (https://www.grammarly.com/privacy-policy). California residents, please see the California Privacy Notice (https://www.grammarly.com/privacy-policy#for-california-users). With your consent, Grammarly may collect data about app usage and device type. Accessibility permission is used to process text written in apps and provide you with tailored writing assistance. We also use this permission to turn Grammarly on when you‚Äôre typing in apps.

Designed for beginners and intermediate learners, this app helps you enhance grammar, vocabulary, and fluency with a step-by-step approach. It covers everything from basic grammar rules to advanced topics, making you confident in speaking and writing English.

Grammar Topics & Concepts
This app helps you understand and apply essential grammar rules with topics like:

Parts of Speech: Learn about nouns, verbs, adjectives, adverbs, and more.

Phrases & Clauses: Understand their types and usage in sentences.

Tenses: Master all 12 English tenses with examples and explanations.

Degrees of Comparison: Learn comparative & superlative forms.

Active & Passive Voice: Improve writing and speaking skills.

Articles, Prepositions & Sentence Patterns: Master the use of a, an, the, in, on, at, etc.

Question Tags: Form question tags to make conversations more natural.

Infinitive & Gerund: Learn their correct usage.

Direct & Indirect Speech: Understand reported speech.

Phrasal Verbs: Learn common phrasal verbs like give up, take off.

Punctuation Marks: Use commas, periods, question marks, and more correctly.

Vocabulary & Speaking Topics

Telling About Yourself: Practice introducing yourself and talking about interests.

Saying Goodbye: Learn various ways to say goodbye.

Reading & Writing Skills
Improve your reading and writing with activities like:

Cloze Test: Fill in blanks to test grammar and vocabulary.

Reading Comprehension: Read passages and answer questions.

Vocabulary-Building Articles: Improve vocabulary and comprehension.

News Articles: Learn new words and stay updated on global events.

Writing Skills: Practice writing news articles, resumes, cover letters, and essays.

Additional Learning Features
Make learning fun with:
Conversations: Learn real-life conversation skills.
Short Stories: Improve reading and vocabulary.
Word Search, Proverbs, Riddles & Quotes: Enjoy learning in an interactive way.
Interview Questions: Practice for job interviews.

Verbs & Tenses Mastery

Grammar Exercises & Quizzes
Reinforce learning with interactive grammar exercises and quizzes covering sentence structure, vocabulary, and tenses. Track progress and improve step by step.

Why Choose English Grammar Book App?
The Complete English Grammar, Speaking, and Conversation App is an all-in-one solution for learning grammar, vocabulary, and speaking skills. Whether you want to practice verb tenses, nouns, adverbs, phrases, or fluency, this app helps you gain confidence and accuracy in English.

Start your learning journey today! Download now and master English step by step!

google.title: Flashcard maker
google.description:
Features

- Quickly create cards with easy operation
Easy to use and made with a thorough focus on ease of use. Quickly create cards.

- Customize it to fit your needs
You can customize it to suit yourself by displaying only the cards you have difficulty with or rearranging them in any order you like. You can also search for words, copy cards, and more.

- Speech-reading function
Text-to-speech reading of cards is supported. The cards can be read out loud, not only in English, but also in several other languages, making it ideal for listening comprehension. The cards can also be played back repeatedly, making it useful in a variety of situations, such as listening while on the move. The reading speed can also be adjusted, so if you have difficulty understanding the text, you can slow down the speed of the reading.

- Support for attaching images and sounds
Images and sounds can be attached to the card. You can launch the camera or voice recorder from within the app and quickly attach them to the card.

- Test mode
A test mode with four choices is provided to play with the flashcards you have created. The test mode is a fun way to learn through audio and animations. You can freely set the scope of the test, for example, to test only the cards you have difficulty with.

- Edit flashcards on PC
CSV file output and import are supported. You can output a template from the application and import it to your PC to register cards at once using your PC.

- Share created flashcards with friends
The app is equipped with a function for outputting flashcards, allowing you to easily share card data.

- Study only the cards you are weak in
You can set the memorization level for each card. You can also display and test only the cards you have difficulty with.

- Beautiful App Design
We aimed to create an app with a beautiful and sophisticated design that makes you want to touch it.

google.title: AnkiDroid Flashcards
google.description:
Memorize anything with AnkiDroid!

AnkiDroid lets you learn flashcards very efficiently by showing them just before you would forget. It is fully compatible with the spaced repetition software Anki (including synchronization), which is available for Windows/Mac/Linux/ChromeOS/iOS.

Study all sorts of things wherever and whenever you want. Make good use of idle times on bus trips, in supermarket queues or any other waiting situation!

Create your own flashcard decks or download free decks compiled for many languages and topics (thousands available).

Add material through the desktop application Anki or directly through Ankidroid. The application even supports adding material automatically from a dictionary!

Need support? https://docs.ankidroid.org/help.html (much preferred over comments in reviews here :-) )

‚òÖ Key features:
‚Ä¢ supported flashcard contents: text, images, sounds, mathjax
‚Ä¢ spaced repetition (supermemo 2 algorithm)
‚Ä¢ text-to-speech integration
‚Ä¢ thousands of premade decks
‚Ä¢ progress widget
‚Ä¢ detailed statistics
‚Ä¢ syncing with AnkiWeb
‚Ä¢ open source

‚òÖ Additional features:
‚Ä¢ write answers (optional)
‚Ä¢ whiteboard
‚Ä¢ card editor/adder
‚Ä¢ card browser
‚Ä¢ tablet layout
‚Ä¢ import existing collection files (via Anki Desktop)
‚Ä¢ add cards by intent from other applications like dictionaries
‚Ä¢ custom font support
‚Ä¢ full backup system
‚Ä¢ navigation by swipe, tap, shake
‚Ä¢ fully customisable
‚Ä¢ dynamic deck handling
‚Ä¢ dark mode
‚Ä¢ 100+ localisations!
‚Ä¢ All previous AnkiDroid versions can be downloaded from the website

google.title: Flashcards Deluxe
google.description:
Flashcards Deluxe is an easy to use yet powerful and full-featured flashcard app which you can use to study just about anything you want.


(There is a free lite version available.)

Features:

‚Ä¢ Two smart study modes that automatically focus more on the cards you miss: Leitner and a more advanced Spaced Repetition mode
‚Ä¢ Text to speech (TTS) audio in 18 languages (no internet connection needed to study) 
‚Ä¢ Multiple choice option 
‚Ä¢ Spelling tests (listen to audio and use keyboard to answer) 
‚Ä¢ Searchable listing of your cards that allows you to easily look up other terms as you study 
‚Ä¢ Organize decks in folders and combine decks for studying 
‚Ä¢ Several flashcard color themes to choose from (sky, wood, chalkboard, etc.) 
‚Ä¢ Divide cards into categories 
‚Ä¢ 1 to 5 sided cards 
‚Ä¢ Include pictures and sounds. Zoom into pictures. Auto repeat sounds. 
‚Ä¢ 3 response levels: Wrong, I kind of know, I know really well (vs the standard correct/wrong) - for more efficient studying 
‚Ä¢ Easy navigation - swipe or tap to answer (customizable) 
‚Ä¢ Draw self-graded answer with your finger (drawing not saved)
‚Ä¢ Automatically turn cards off after getting them correct a certain number/percentage of reviews 
‚Ä¢ Clean, efficient user interface, including full-screen and landscape viewing 
‚Ä¢ Custom text and background colors 
‚Ä¢ Browse mode that lets you easily navigate forward or back without keeping score 
‚Ä¢ Slideshow mode 
‚Ä¢ Large number of cards (10,000+) can be imported easily 
‚Ä¢ Backup your flashcards to your computer 
‚Ä¢ Dropbox and Google Drive support
‚Ä¢ Very easy to get started, with lots of features and options for advanced users 
‚Ä¢ Great support! I promptly respond to any questions or feedback you may have. Use my website's public forum or email me. 

You can create flashcards either on your computer or directly within the app. If you don't want to make your own, you can browse and download flashcards the app's Shared Library.

Please see our website at OrangeOrApple.com for more information. If you are not satisfied with the product for any reason, please let me know why and I'll try to help.

google.title: Brainscape: Smarter Flashcards
google.description: Delete your old flashcard apps! Brainscape has the SMARTEST AI-powered flashcard maker, the BEST marketplace of expert flashcards, and the MOST EFFECTIVE spaced repetition study algorithm on the planet. How does it work? Brainscape‚Äôs intelligent study system has been designed in accordance with decades of proven cognitive science to help you learn faster and remember longer than with any other flashcard app. (And we don‚Äôt waste time on games. Our flashcards are for serious learners.) Brainscape distills any subject down into bite-sized facts (neatly organized into decks and classes), which are posed as question-and-answer pairs, compelling you to actively recall information from scratch. You then rate how well you know each concept on a scale of 1 to 5, and Brainscape determines the perfect time interval at which to repeat that flashcard again. If you know the answer well, you‚Äôll see that flashcard less often; if you don‚Äôt know it well, you‚Äôll see it again and again, at frequent intervals, until it‚Äôs deeply ingrained into your brain. And it‚Äôs this totally unique combination of active recall, self-assessment (metacognition), and spaced repetition that is scientifically proven to significantly slash your required study time! Where do all of Brainscape‚Äôs awesome flashcards come from? Three places: THE WORLD‚ÄôS TOP EXPERTS. Brainscape partners with top publishers, schools, and educators to create comprehensive collections of certified flashcards for a diverse array of subjects, from foreign languages (we are the best language-learning tool in the world) to high-stakes exams like the AP series, MBE (bar exam), Series 7, NCLEX, MCAT, and more. YOUR PEERS. Top students, professors, teachers, tutorpreneurs, and businesses around the world have created over 1 million subjects that are available to search on Brainscape‚Äôs Knowledge Genome. YOU! You can easily create and organize thousands of multimedia flashcards featuring text, images, and even audio files, both on Brainscape‚Äôs website AND within the app itself. You can also share your decks with your classmates and collaboratively develop content together. How much does it cost? Creating and sharing great text flashcards is FREE. (Woohoo! And sorry, we do have to charge for image creation for security reasons.) And for unlimited access to ALL of Brainscape's user-generated and premium, expert-curated content, as well as optional features, like bookmarks and card reversibility--or to me your content private, you can upgrade to Pro for $19.99 (monthly), $59.99 (every 6 months), or $95.99 (annually). Alternatively, you can unlock a LIFETIME of learning with Brainscape for a one-time cost of only $199.99 American dolla billz. The fine print: The 3 recurring subscriptions (monthly, semiannual, and annual) will renew automatically within 24 hours before the end of the current period, unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the period. You can cancel auto-renewal any time by going to Account Settings, and the cancellation will apply after the active subscription period is complete. Go ahead and learn more about our Terms and Privacy Policy at brainscape.com/terms. What‚Äôs on the horizon? It‚Äôs our vision to empower everyone, everywhere to rise to the challenge of personalized forever-learning. And for this reason, we love hearing from our user community: it‚Äôs through your feedback that we can continue to innovate our platform to be more convenient, efficient, and even fun and social to use!

google.title: ABC Flash Cards - Sight Words
google.description:
ABC Flash Cards - Sight Words is a dynamic educational app designed to foster early literacy and numeracy skills in young children, helping parents provide effective early learning tools at home. This app combines colorful ABC Flash Cards and interactive Sight Words flash cards with engaging Math Flash Cards, creating a complete package to build foundational language and math skills. Developed specifically for young children ages 2-6, ABC Flash Cards - Sight Words offers an intuitive and fun learning experience to support early vocabulary, reading comprehension, and numerical understanding.

Key Features
ABC Flash Cards with Vivid Illustrations
Introduce the alphabet with clear, vibrant flash cards. Each letter card is paired with a charming illustration and audio pronunciation, making it ideal for children‚Äôs first steps in language learning. Kids can recognize letters, associate them with sounds, and gain familiarity with essential phonics.

Sight Words Flash Cards
Build vocabulary skills with a comprehensive selection of sight words, perfect for early reading practice. The app covers basic and 2nd-grade sight words, encouraging young readers to identify words by sight rather than decoding them one letter at a time. This key skill is essential for fluent reading and comprehension.

Math Flash Cards for Numerical Literacy
Lay the groundwork for math skills with number flash cards and basic math concepts. Children can begin counting, recognizing numbers, and exploring early arithmetic in a gentle, age-appropriate way, helping them develop confidence in numbers.

Interactive Learning Games
Keep children engaged with interactive games designed to make learning enjoyable. These games reinforce the concepts presented in the flash cards, allowing kids to practice ABCs, sight words, and numbers in an immersive way. It‚Äôs learning through play!

Progress Tracking
Track your child‚Äôs learning journey with built-in progress tracking tools. Parents can monitor the words and numbers their child has mastered, encouraging a structured and goal-oriented approach to early education. This feature helps maintain steady progress, making it easy to celebrate milestones.

Made for Kids, Trusted by Parents
ABC Flash Cards - Sight Words is designed for young children but is equally appealing to parents. The user-friendly interface is simple for little hands to navigate, while eye-catching illustrations and audio enhance every interaction, making it enjoyable for kids to return to their favorite flash cards and games. The app is a valuable resource for parents seeking free, high-quality educational tools that focus on early literacy and numeracy. With elements like Flashcards for Kids, ABC Flash Cards Free, and Math Flash Cards, the app effectively brings essential educational resources to families.

Why Choose ABC Flash Cards - Sight Words?
ABC Flash Cards - Sight Words provides a focused, interactive learning experience that combines visual, auditory, and hands-on activities to reinforce early literacy and math skills. As children explore Alphabet Flash Cards, Sight Words, and Math Flash Cards, they build a solid foundation that supports vocabulary development, reading skills, and an introduction to numerical literacy. Whether used for daily learning or occasional practice, it‚Äôs a tool that grows with your child‚Äôs educational needs.

Perfect for families in the US, UK, Canada, and Australia, this app is a trusted companion for children starting their learning journey, offering a safe and inspiring environment to learn and grow. Start enhancing your child‚Äôs reading and math skills today with ABC Flash Cards - Sight Words!

google.title: RemNote - Notes & Flashcards
google.description:
RemNote is an all-in-one learning tool that combines note-taking, knowledge management, flashcards, and spaced repetition to enable effective and efficient learning. Sure, it‚Äôs a note-taking tool. But there‚Äôs also flashcards, PDFs, backlinks, and more - to help you study, stay organized, and think.

WHY CHOOSE REMNOTE?

Learn more in less time: RemNote makes learning easy. Get higher grades or reach your learning goals in less time.

Grow your knowledge: Using RemNote you‚Äôll can connect the concept you learn about and generate more ideas. 

Organize your thoughts, plans, and tasks: We‚Äôre built to help you plan all of your life in one place.


WHAT DOES REMNOTE HAVE TO OFFER?

Notes, Docs & Outlines: Capture and link your ideas. RemNote is built for thinking and long-term knowledge management.

Smart Flashcards: Create flashcards directly from your notes.

Spaced Repetition: Remember more with less studying. Build your long-term memory with the spaced repetition plan built into your flashcards.

Linked Reference: Reference and review all notes connected to a specific topic with contextual links and create flashcard sets on-the-fly as you take notes.

PDF Annotation: Work with external documents directly in the app, make your notes and create flashcards using the source materials. Highlight, create margin notes, and link sections of your document to the rest of your digital library.

Multimedia Embedding: Incorporate documents, videos, and anything else embeddable into your notes as you make them.

Tags: Tag your notes, to-do items, and even multimedia source materials like images and video. And get your life sorted.

To-dos: Take in new information and generate to-do lists and action items with reminders on the fly, without juggling windows or switching apps.


WANT MORE?

Easy Formula Handling: The Latex feature allows you to create inline formulas with a simple annotation editor. Easily create and edit formulas on the fly as you take notes, and enjoy a clear and attractive display of these formulas as you review your notes and flashcards.

Templates: Create templates to make repetitive tasks a thing of the past. Whether you‚Äôre preparing briefs or structured lecture notes, a predefined template can help you create better materials, save time, and pay more attention to the subject matter.

Build knowledge that lasts forever: Import from every note-taking app. Bring your data, and enjoy!

Code Block Notes: Take notes with a tool designed to accommodate programming, keeping your notes and annotations visually and semantically separate from your code.

Works offline: Access and make changes with or without internet access.

Unlimited Free Plan: We‚Äôre committed to a powerful free plan for every inspired learner.

We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. If you have any questions or concerns about our practices with regard to your personal information, please contact us at support@remnote.com. or visit https://www.remnote.com/privacy_policy

Frantastique provides daily personalized French lessons. Test Frantastique for free and get a level assessment and a personalized pedagogical report! It‚Äôs the easiest, friendliest way to learn French:

Personalized French Content: Frantastique lessons are based on your needs, your requests, and your level. You‚Äôll come across professional scenarios, a variety of accents, exercises and plenty of humor. 10 to 15 minutes daily is all it takes! 

Motivation, Humor and French Culture: Discover the diversity and richness of French culture around the world with the help of Victor Hugo and friends. Every day, you'll come across different accents, songs, and films in addition to original stories and texts.

You can try Frantastique for 7 days free of charge. This test is limited to the first seven days of the program, and is absolutely free and non-binding. Offline access: review French grammar anywhere: on the bus, on the tube, at home or between two meetings. google.title: Learn German with Seedlang
google.description:
Learn German with our language learning app and focus on improving your speaking and listening skills, as well as your vocab knowledge and grammar comprehension. We do this by building interactive experiences using videos of native speakers, so you'll learn the best way possible.

We‚Äòve built this app in partnership with the Easy German YouTube channel and have a strong focus on teaching German with real people and authentic language. This app takes a unique approach to enhancing your speaking, listening, and grammar skills, making it easy to increase and sustain your vocab and grammar knowledge as well as your pronunciation.

Why Seedlang?

Simply put, we combine real humor and fun with a deep understanding of the German language. We craft learning experiences that are unlike others you have experienced before in the world of language apps. Learn German with Seedlang, and you'll be amazed at how swiftly you improve your vocab, grammar, speaking, and listening skills.

Learn German with Interactive Stories

To increase your vocab knowledge, we use video-based interactive stories that are fun, surprising, and memorable. This will help to give context to what you are learning and make building new memories of vocab and grammar feel effortless. You want to increase your vocab knowledge and grammar comprehension without hardships? Try this app, and you will see how simple it is to increase your vocab and grammar skills.

A New Type of Flashcards to Learn German

You've never seen vocab flashcards like these before. They combine video, speaking practice, and embedded grammar to create a fun and effective experience to learn German. This vocab learning feature is also a part of our free content, so you can start creating your own vocab lists and review your vocab regarding your needs.

Learn German Actively Through Speaking

Recording audio of your pronunciation and comparing it with that of German native speakers allows you to improve your speaking. As you practice these improvements, your muscle memory for the language strengthens and speaking becomes effortless.

Grammar at Your Fingertips

We are most receptive to learning grammar after we've made a mistake. So, if you make a grammar mistake with a word, simply click it to display detailed grammar information. We understand the feeling that learning grammar is the most difficult part of learning a new language. But when you learn German grammar with Seedlang, you will find how much easier it is to remember the grammar rules when their explanations are right there at your fingertips when you need them.

Learn German the way you want

Use our vocab trainer to build flashcard decks tailored to the specific vocab that you want to learn. Each vocab card is pulled from one of our stories, ensuring that learning a new language comes with all the fun context that makes it easy to remember your German vocab and grammar topics.

Learn German with Trivia games

Included in this language learning app, you can test your German comprehension by competing against other German language students in an interactive trivia game. This fun feature adds a playful element to your language learning journey and enlarges your vocab knowledge in no time.

You can start this unique language learning adventure with the free app version and explore vocab, grammar, and speaking practice. Every interaction is a step closer to mastering the German language. Start your journey towards A1, A2, B1, and B2 proficiency levels covering pronunciation, grammar, and vocab with the best German language learning tool. Download this free German language learning app now and try learning German the Seedlang way.

From the award-winning creators of Studycat for Schools, comes Learn German! The #1 way for kids to learn Deutsch!

From preschool and beyond, Learn German by Studycat inspires children's innate love of learning with interactive games and activities.

Our bite-sized lessons will keep your child motivated while they discover a new language and build bilingual skills for a lifetime!

WHY STUDYCAT?

‚Ä¢ Learn German, in German. All our activities focus on virtual language immersion, which means your child won't be hearing any English, only German! This might be confusing at first, but trust us, it's the best way to learn.

‚Ä¢ Everyday Language. Our lessons teach words and expressions that kids can apply in their everyday lives, so they can get a head start developing their bilingual abilities.

‚Ä¢ Get Talking Fast. With our interactive speaking challenges, kids will be encouraged to speak entire words and phrases on their own! The earlier kids start their language-learning journey, the more likely they are to reach proficiency quickly.

‚Ä¢ Vocal Variety. Our characters' voices use different tones, expressions, and accents so that kids can pick up on the subtleties of pronunciation from different speakers.

‚Ä¢ Designed by Experts. All our activities are designed by language and early-education experts. Thoughtfully developed lessons will build your child's confidence with every step.

‚Ä¢ Learner Profiles (coming soon). Create up to four personalized profiles for different family members, allowing tailored learning paths and individual progress tracking.

‚Ä¢ Safe for Kids & Ad-Free. Parents can rest easy knowing that there are no pesky ads to distract children from their learning. All content is appropriate for ages 3 and up.

‚Ä¢ Offline Learning. On a plane, at a restaurant, or in a park? No problem! Learn German by Studycat is available for both online and offline use.

WHAT ARE PARENTS SAYING?

‚ÄúAs a parent trying to raise bilingual children at home, Studycat is a helpful app to start them off and create excitement about the language.‚Äù ‚Äî Fluent in 3 Months

‚ÄúEverything has been thought out carefully and the games and activities are really engaging.‚Äù ‚Äî Bilingual Kidspot

‚ÄúThe concept is so simple but extremely effective. I even found myself learning at the same time.‚Äù ‚Äî Bump, Baby & You

google.title: Drops: Learn German
google.description:
What if üá©üá™ German vocabulary learning would be a crazy fun game instead of boring memorisation drills? Drops makes language learning an effortless fun. Practical vocabulary is bound to your memories through beautiful graphics and quick mini-games.
The crazy part? You have only 5 mins per day. Might sound insane but works like charm! :)
These are the ingredients of the secret sauce:
üëÄ 100% illustrated: Pictures directly carry the meaning -  you don‚Äôt have to use your native language at all! No intermediary. Faster, more effective and of course more fun! :)
üèé 5 min sessions: limiting practice time sounds crazy but it it makes it incredibly addictive - which is cool thing for learning. The barrier of entry is close to zero so you can‚Äôt have any excuses: you‚Äôll have 5 minutes even on the busiest day!
üïπ Effortless play: We know why games are fun and addictive and distilled the essence into Drops. The result is a truly immersive experience but it‚Äôs not waste of your time while you play because you build a valuable knowledge.
‚ö°Qucik: Keyboard typing is painfully slow. Welcome rapid swipes and taps! Trust us, you‚Äôll need those extra seconds during the quick learning session ;)
üéØ Vocabulary only: Zero grammar, just handpicked practical words. That‚Äôs our focus and we do it extremely well. The app teaches the Korean ‚Äúalphabet‚Äù Hangul (hangoul) too!
üíÅForge a habit: Drops wants to make you language learning addict. Effectiveness is nothing without a well established habit. We help you build one!
We are extremely proud of our lovely word pronunciations by seasoned voice talents!
Drops is free for casual learners: more than 1700 words in 99 topics are all available for everyone. Hardcore language learners can subscribe for premium to progress faster with unlimited learning time. Subscriptions start from $2.99 / month.
 
üåç Our goal is to empower people of the world via language knowledge by providing a special tool that utilizes the universal language we all speak: pictures.
 
 
p.s.: be careful, this app really can get you addicted to to language learning.
 
-----------------
üòç If you love Drops as much as we enjoyed building it, please leave us a review! :)
 
Questions? Contact us at sup@languagedrops.com

Download Readle FREE and start learning German today! üá©üá™ ‚òÖ Easily read and listen to German anytime, anywhere. You'll forget that you learn German along the way! ‚òÖ ‚òÖ Enhance your vocabulary with smart flashcards using a spaced repetition system. Listen to recordings by native German speakers, a perfect way to practice your listening skills. „Äê Customized German Stories „Äë Explore exciting stories & news lessons tailored to A1, A2, B1, B2, and C1 levels, helping you grasp vocabulary and grammar in various contexts. „Äê Individual Flashcards „Äë Create personalized flashcard decks from the German stories you read. Practice German grammar in multiple contexts easily. „Äê Quiz to Test Your German Skills „Äë Each story includes a quiz to practice grammar, vocabulary, and articles (der, die, das).
